en: Liver and kidney are particularly rich in vitamin A.
cn: 肝脏和肾脏的维生素A含量尤其丰富。

en: Details are available from the Hon. Sec. A.R. Bushby.
cn: 详情可咨询名誉秘书A.R.布什比。

en: I was assigned to Troop A of the 10th Cavalry.
cn: 我被派往第10骑兵队的A连。

en: Chantal was lucky to be able to salvage her career.
cn: 尚塔尔能保住她的事业算是走了运。

en: The RAF recognized him as an out-standingly able engineer.
cn: 英国皇家空军表彰他是一名非常能干的机械师。

en: Anton was able to transfer from Lavine's to an American company.
cn: 安东成功地从拉文调到了一家美国公司.

en: No matter where you go in life or how old you get, there's always something new to learn about. After all, life is full of surprises.
cn: 不管你生活在哪里，你有多少岁，总有新东西要学习，毕竟，生活总是充满惊喜。

en: Instead of complaining about what's wrong, be grateful for what's right.
cn: 别抱怨不好的事，要对美好的事心存感恩。

en: If you're not satisfied with the life you're living, don't just complain. Do something about it.
cn: 对于现况的不满，不能只是抱怨，要有作出改变。

en: That big high-rise above us is where Brian lives.
cn: 我们上面的那座摩天大楼就是布赖恩住的地方。

en: Then there was a woman's voice, rising shrilly above the barking.
cn: 接着，一个女人的尖厉声音盖过了犬吠声。

en: He had to have one leg amputated above the knee.
cn: 他的一条腿不得不从膝部以上截断。

en: The car park was absolutely packed solid with people.
cn: 停车场被人挤得水泄不通。

en: There are thousands of students absolutely gagging to come to this university.
cn: 肯定有成千上万的学生都渴望到这所大学念书。

en: "I absolutely hated school," Rachel says. "I skived off all the time."
cn: “我恨透了学校，”雷切尔说，“我总是逃学。”

en: Captain Cook safely navigated his ship without accident for 100 voyages.
cn: 库克船长驾驶的船安全出航100次无事故。

en: Through some unfortunate accident, the information reached me a day late.
cn: 由于发生了不幸的意外，我知道消息的时候已经晚了一天。

en: The police say his death was an accident, officially at least.
cn: 警方说他的死是个意外，起码官方消息如此。

en: The route that the boatmen choose varies according to the water level.
cn: 船夫选择的路线会随水位的变化而有所不同。

en: He advocates streaming children, and educating them according to their needs.
cn: 他提倡把学生按能力分班，因需施教。

en: According to the prosecution, the officers manufactured an elaborate story.
cn: 根据控方意见，官员们精心编造了事情经过。

en: They stumble across a ghost town inhabited by a rascally gold prospector.
cn: 他们偶然来到一个居住着一位狡诈的淘金者的废墟之城。

en: She knelt and brushed her lips softly across Michael's cheek.
cn: 她跪了下来，轻吻迈克尔的脸颊。

en: Lucy had strung a banner across the wall saying "Welcome Home Daddy".
cn: 露西在墙上挂了一条横幅，上面写着“欢迎爸爸回家”。

en: He wants to act in concert with other nations.
cn: 他想和其他国家采取一致行动。

en: Politicians across the political spectrum have denounced the act.
cn: 各党派的政客们都对该行为表示谴责。

en: It was imperative that he act as naturally as possible.
cn: 最重要的是他要做到尽可能自然。

en: The action is an open violation of the Vienna Convention.
cn: 该行为公然违背了《维也纳公约》。

en: Now there is a dawning realisation that drastic action is necessary.
cn: 现在人们开始意识到必须采取断然的行动。

en: The lift started off, juddered, and went out of action.
cn: 电梯开动了，接着剧烈震颤起来，然后就毫无反应了。

en: He actually became convinced that the nurses had an unanswerable case.
cn: 他实际上已经相信了护士们的情况确实如此。

en: They actually moved down from upstairs because the rent's that expensive.
cn: 他们确实从楼上搬到了楼下，因为房租太贵了。

en: He will actually be serving three concurrent five-year sentences.
cn: 实际上，他将服3个5年徒刑，合并执行。

en: You have to admit that you are, in fact, in difficulties.
cn: 你不得不承认，你事实上是陷入了困境。

en: Embassy security personnel refused to admit him or his wife.
cn: 使馆保安人员不允许他和夫人进入。

en: I have to admit that I have bad handwriting.
cn: 我不得不承认自己的字写得不好看。

en: She was afraid in a way that was quite new to her.
cn: 她感到从未有过的害怕。

en: "I'm afraid he's ill." — "I'm sorry to hear that."
cn: “恐怕他生病了。”——“真是遗憾。”

en: Why should a great community like a university be afraid of nihilism?
cn: 为什么像大学这样人才济济的社区要害怕虚无主义呢？

en: No matter where you go in life or how old you get, there's always something new to learn about. After all, life is full of surprises.
cn: 不管你生活在哪里，你有多少岁，总有新东西要学习，毕竟，生活总是充满惊喜。

en: He was fired from his job after roughing up a colleague.
cn: 他因为对一位同事动粗而被开除了。

en: The mystery hero imme-diately alerted police after spotting a bomb.
cn: 那个无名英雄发现炸弹后马上报了警。

en: They rose to the challenge of entertaining 80 school-children for an afternoon.
cn: 他们一个下午成功接待了80名学童。

en: It was a marvellous afternoon with a huge turnout of people.
cn: 那是个美妙的下午，出席人数众多。

en: The President met this afternoon with his top military advisers.
cn: 总统今天下午会见了他最得力的军事顾问。

en: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.
cn: 努力过，失败过，没关系，屡战屡败，屡败屡战，每一次失败都比上一次更好。

en: The central heating's been turned off. I've turned it on again.
cn: 中央供暖系统已经关上。我又将它打开了。

en: "Ah, Captain Fox," Martin McGuinness said affably. "Nice to see you again."
cn: “啊，福克斯上尉，”马丁·麦吉尼斯亲切地说，“很高兴再次见到您。”

en: He spent 25 years campaigning against racist and unjust immigration laws.
cn: 他用了25年的时间与带有种族歧视色彩和没有公正可言的移民法作斗争。

en: "One thing you can never insure against is corruption among your staff."—"Agreed."
cn: “永远也防不胜防的就是员工内部的贪污腐败。”——“同意。”

en: He slewed the car against the side of the building.
cn: 他的车滑到了大楼的一侧，抵住了。

en: Beauty is an attitude. It has nothing to do with age.
cn: 美是一种态度，与年龄无关。

en: He knew what he wanted to do from the age of 14.
cn: 他14岁起就知道自己日后干什么了。

en: In some cases there is a mini-mum age limit.
cn: 有些情况下有最低年龄限制。

en: The agent spied for East Germany for more than twenty years.
cn: 该特工人员为东德做了20多年的间谍。

en: We went straight to the estate agent and wrote out a cheque.
cn: 我们径直到房地产经纪人那里开了一张支票。

en: Cheap flights are available from budget travel agent from £240.
cn: 收费低廉的旅行社可以提供240英镑起的低价机票。

en: Mechanization happened years ago on the farms of Islay.
cn: 数年前，艾莱的农场就实现了机械化。

en: Rationing had put an end to a surfeit of biscuits long ago.
cn: 定量供应很久以前就结束了饼干过剩的状况。

en: Just a few days ago, I finished a commission.
cn: 就在几天前，我完成了一项委托创作任务。

en: The dampness of the forest did not agree with him physically.
cn: 他的身体不能适应森林的潮湿。

en: It remains to be seen whether her parliamentary colleagues will agree.
cn: 她的国会同僚是否同意，现在还无从知晓。

en: I think you'd agree he's a very respected columnist.
cn: 我想你得承认他是个备受尊敬的专栏作家。

en: "Ah, Captain Fox," Martin McGuinness said affably. "Nice to see you again."
cn: “啊，福克斯上尉，”马丁·麦吉尼斯亲切地说，“很高兴再次见到您。”

en: Ah yes, but think of all the family life they're missing.
cn: 是这样，不过别忘了他们错过了多少天伦之乐。

en: I'm meeting Anna Langenbach. Ah, this seems to be the train now.
cn: 我要去见安娜·朗根巴赫。啊，这像是我要乘坐的火车了。

en: He looked straight ahead and overtook a lumbering lorry.
cn: 他眼睛直视前方，加速超过了前面一辆慢吞吞行进的大卡车。

en: Mark was out of earshot, walking ahead of them.
cn: 马克走在前面，听不见他们的声音。

en: He pushed everyone full speed ahead until production hit a bottleneck.
cn: 他催促所有人拼命干活，直到生产遭遇瓶颈。

en: The cold, misty air felt wonderful on his face.
cn: 雾蒙蒙的寒冷空气使他脸上感觉很舒爽。

en: The volume of scheduled flights is straining the air traffic control system.
cn: 定期航班的数量正让空中交通指挥系统不堪重负。

en: America has enough firepower in the area to mount sustained air strikes.
cn: 美国在该地区拥有足够的火力发动持续的空中打击。

en: It's an affront to human dignity to keep someone alive like this.
cn: 如此维持一个人的生命是对人类尊严的冒犯。

en: The big factories are trying to stay alive by cutting costs.
cn: 大型工厂正试图通过削减成本以维持生存。

en: I never expected to feel so alive in my life again.
cn: 我怎么也没想到自己会再一次这样活力焕发。

en: No matter where you go in life or how old you get, there's always something new to learn about. After all, life is full of surprises.
cn: 不管你生活在哪里，你有多少岁，总有新东西要学习，毕竟，生活总是充满惊喜。

en: If you wait, all that happens is that you get older.
cn: 如果你等待，发生的只有变老。

en: The happiest are not those who own all the best things, but those who can appreciate the beauty of life.
cn: 最幸福的人们并不一定什么都是最好，只是他们懂得欣赏生活的美好。

en: The representatives almost came to blows at a meeting.
cn: 代表们在一次会议上差点动起手来。

en: It's almost a foregone conclusion that you'll get what you want.
cn: 你将得到你想要的，这几乎是确定无疑的。

en: By 1973, this gap had narrowed almost to vanishing point.
cn: 到1973年，这一差距已缩小到几乎为零。

en: Don't leave a child alone in a room with an open fire.
cn: 房间里有裸露的明火时，不要让孩子独处其中。

en: He knew when to leave well alone and when to interfere.
cn: 他知道什么时候该适可而止，什么时候该插手干预。

en: He had always been an outcast, unwanted and alone.
cn: 他一直都被视为异类，无人理睬，形单影只。

en: Good luck is when an opportunity comes along and you're prepared for it.
cn: 好运就是当机会来临时，你早已做好了准备。

en: I was on my own and these fellows came along towards me.
cn: 我正一个人走着，一些家伙朝我走过来。

en: Come along, lad. Time for you to get home.
cn: 来吧，小伙子。你该回家了。

en: He was already asleep in the bed, which smelled faintly of mildew.
cn: 他已经在略带霉味的床上睡着了。

en: The material consisted only of already published, unclassified information.
cn: 这份材料里只有一些已公开的、非保密性质的信息。

en: The country's politicians are already heaving a collective sigh of relief.
cn: 该国的政界人士均已松了口气。

en: Are they going to be alright?
cn: 他们会好吗？

en: Are you going to be alright here all on your tod?
cn: 你一个人在这儿行 吗 ?

en: Are you getting on alright with your project?
cn: 你的项目进展顺利吧?

en: Surfing the Internet is fun, but it's also a time waster.
cn: 上网很有意思，但也很浪费时间。

en: They also left a card, imprinted with the name Sean Lynch.
cn: 他们还留下了一张名片，上面印着肖恩·林奇的名字。

en: Once wholesale prices are deregulated, consumer prices will also rise.
cn: 一旦批发价格放开，零售价格也会随之上涨。

en: No matter where you go in life or how old you get, there's always something new to learn about. After all, life is full of surprises.
cn: 不管你生活在哪里，你有多少岁，总有新东西要学习，毕竟，生活总是充满惊喜。

en: The ideological divisions between the parties aren't always obvious.
cn: 政党之间的意识形态界线并不总是泾渭分明的。

en: There has always been a difference between community radio and commercial radio.
cn: 社区广播电台和商业广播电台一直是有区别的。

en: I too am committing myself to continue the fight for justice.
cn: 我本人也保证将继续为正义而战。

en: They have both behaved very badly and I am very hurt.
cn: 他们俩都很不友善，让我非常难过。

en: This, I am sorry to say, is almost entirely wishful thinking.
cn: 我很遗憾，这几乎完全是一厢情愿的想法。

en: It's not about making the amazing saves. It's the little things and small things that made great gatekeepers great.
cn: 伟大的门将不是靠神奇的扑救成就，而是靠注重小事和细节成功。（Tim Howard美国国家队门将）

en: The most amazing thing about nature is its infinite variety.
cn: 大自然最让人惊叹的是它的无限多样性。

en: This small country has an amazing variety of landforms.
cn: 这个小国家拥有令人惊叹的丰富的地貌类型。

en: He's touring South America at this moment in time.
cn: 他此刻正在南美旅游观光。

en: America has enough firepower in the area to mount sustained air strikes.
cn: 美国在该地区拥有足够的火力发动持续的空中打击。

en: America imports about 190 million pounds of tea a year.
cn: 美国每年进口大约1.9亿磅茶叶。

en: Very likely he'd told them he had American business interests.
cn: 很可能他已经告诉他们自己拥有美国商业利益.

en: Early American weathervanes were most often cut from flat wooden boards.
cn: 美国早期的风向标大多截自平直的木板。

en: She has had many credits and name-checks in American Vogue.
cn: 美国版《时尚》多次对她进行赞扬或是提到她的名字。

en: "One thing you can never insure against is corruption among your staff."—"Agreed."
cn: “永远也防不胜防的就是员工内部的贪污腐败。”——“同意。”

en: A former associate of Mr. Pierce's was among the project's boosters.
cn: 皮尔斯先生的一个前合伙人是这个计划的热心支持者之一。

en: There is a certain impatience among some of the soldiers.
cn: 有些士兵有点儿不耐烦。

en: Beauty is an attitude. It has nothing to do with age.
cn: 美是一种态度，与年龄无关。

en: Good luck is when an opportunity comes along and you're prepared for it.
cn: 好运就是当机会来临时，你早已做好了准备。

en: Here's an inside tip: The faster you rise, the harder you fall.
cn: 给你一个小忠告：爬得越快，摔得越疼。

en: Remember, keep a positive attitude and good things will happen.
cn: 记住：保持乐观的心态，好事自然会发生。

en: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, many are stronger at the broken places.
cn: 生活总是让我们遍体鳞伤，但到后来，那些受伤的地方会变得更坚强。

en: For what do we live, but to make sport for our neighbours, and laugh at them in our turn?
cn: 我们活着是为了什么？不就是给邻居当笑柄，再反过来笑他们。

en: Thank you a thousand times, you're an angel.
cn: 万分感谢，你真是个大好人。

en: The ill-advised conceit of the guardian angel dooms the film from the start.
cn: 对守护天使的蹩脚设计弄巧成拙，从一开始就注定这部电影要失败。

en: A delightful guide was my guardian angel for the first week of the tour.
cn: 令人愉快的导游是我第一周旅行的守护神。

en: They get angry if they think they are being treated disrespectfully.
cn: 他们要是觉得受到了怠慢，就会大动肝火。

en: Sarah came forward with a tight and angry face.
cn: 萨拉走上前来，紧绷着脸，怒气冲冲。

en: I felt incredibly ashamed of myself for getting so angry.
cn: 我对自己发那么大的火而深感惭愧。

en: She reached into the wardrobe and extracted another tracksuit.
cn: 她伸手又从衣橱里取出一件运动服。

en: The two policemen were joined by another policeman also carrying a pistol.
cn: 另一名持枪警察和那两名警察会合了。

en: I hate to rush you but I have another appointment later on.
cn: 我真不想催你，但我稍后还有一个约会。

en: "I can't give you an answer now," he hedged.
cn: “我现在不能回答你，”他闪避道。

en: Two historical questions — you can answer them how you like.
cn: 两个历史问题——你可以随便回答。

en: Two men answer-ing the description of the suspects tried to enter Switzerland.
cn: 与描述的疑犯样子相符的两名男子试图进入瑞士。

en: I don't want any more of that heavy stuff.
cn: 我再也不想碰那种麻烦事了。

en: Well, at any rate, let me thank you for all you did.
cn: 好吧，不管怎样，还是要感谢你所做的一切。

en: You are welcome to visit the hospital at any time.
cn: 你可以随时来医院。

en: The doll-like figures in these stories are unlike anybody, let alone oneself.
cn: 这些故事中的玩偶形象跟谁都不像，更不用说像自己了。

en: Roy told his sorrowful tale with simple words anybody could understand.
cn: 罗伊用简单的、人人都能理解的语言讲述了他那个伤感的故事。

en: Presidents are not any different from anybody else; they're human beings.
cn: 总统跟一般人没有什么不同；他们也是人。

en: I don't react anymore when opponents try to niggle me.
cn: 对手找茬惹我时，我不会再理他们。

en: If you take my work away I can'tbe happy anymore.
cn: 如果你炒我鱿鱼，我就再也高兴不起来了。

en: I don't feel that anyone can kick me around anymore.
cn: 我认为没人敢再欺负我了。

en: She'd do anything for a bit of pin money.
cn: 为了挣点外快，她什么都肯做。

en: People will work themselves up into a state about anything.
cn: 人们总会沉不住气，为任何事感到担忧。

en: "What would you like to eat?" — "Anything'll do me, Eva."
cn: “你想吃什么？”——“我吃什么都行，伊娃。”

en: A miracle is something that seems impossible but happens anyway.
cn: 奇迹就是看似不可能，却发生了。

en: Recession has simply accelerated changes that have been reshaping the industry anyway.
cn: 经济萧条只不过加速了原本就在改变行业状况的变化。

en: Mary Ann doesn't want to have children. Not right now, anyway.
cn: 玛丽·安不想要孩子，至少现在不想。

en: I didn't see that my career as a film-maker was going anywhere.
cn: 我发现我作为电影制片人的职业没有什么发展前途。

en: Andrew went rigid when he saw a dog, any dog, anywhere.
cn: 安德鲁过去只要看见狗，无论在哪里，无论什么狗，都会吓得一动不动。

en: You can go anywhere and still the compass points north or south.
cn: 无论走到哪里，罗盘仍然指向北或南。

en: She went directly to Simon's apartment and knocked on the door.
cn: 她直奔西蒙的房间，敲了敲门。

en: Gerome tried to talk her into taking an apartment in Paris.
cn: 杰罗姆试图说服她在巴黎买一套公寓。

en: Stevens wrote him a note asking him to come to his apartment.
cn: 史蒂文斯给他写了张便条，请他去自己的公寓。

en: The happiest are not those who own all the best things, but those who can appreciate the beauty of life.
cn: 最幸福的人们并不一定什么都是最好，只是他们懂得欣赏生活的美好。

en: It is easy to appreciate the craftsmanship of Armani.
cn: 阿玛尼的精致工艺很容易博得人们的赞誉。

en: I do very much appreciate the quietness and privacy here.
cn: 我的确非常喜欢这里宁静幽雅、不受打扰的氛围。

en: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, many are stronger at the broken places.
cn: 生活总是让我们遍体鳞伤，但到后来，那些受伤的地方会变得更坚强。

en: The happiest are not those who own all the best things, but those who can appreciate the beauty of life.
cn: 最幸福的人们并不一定什么都是最好，只是他们懂得欣赏生活的美好。

en: The difference between who you are and who you want to be is what you do.
cn: 你是什么样的人和你想成为什么样的之间的差距就是，你做了什么。

en: The study links the main living area to the kitchen.
cn: 书房把主要的生活区与厨房连在一起。

en: The spokesman confirmed that the area was now in rebel hands.
cn: 这位发言人证实该地区现已落入叛乱分子手中。

en: America has enough firepower in the area to mount sustained air strikes.
cn: 美国在该地区拥有足够的火力发动持续的空中打击。

en: When you are sitting, keep your elbow on the arm rest.
cn: 坐立时，把胳膊肘靠在扶手上。

en: Amy lifted her arm to wave. "Goodbye," she called.
cn: 埃米举起胳膊挥挥手。“再见，”她喊道。

en: He is recovering from an operation to reset his arm.

en: The augmentation of the army began along traditional lines.
cn: 军队扩编是沿着传统路线开始的。

en: The army is still one of the last male bastions.

en: On Sunday Cohen lay around the house all day.
cn: 科恩星期天一整天都在家无所事事。

en: They were knocking around together for about a year.
cn: 他们交往大概有一年了。

cn: 有些地方执法官滥用逮捕权进行逼供。

en: Failure is never quite so frightening as regret.

en: The Koran recommends fasting as a penance before pilgrimages.
cn: 《古兰经》劝告人们在朝圣前斋戒，以作为一种补赎。

en: That was Nicholas's cue to ask for another chocolate chip cookie.

en: He was too proud to ask his family for help and support.
cn: 他自尊心太强，不愿向家人寻求帮助和支持。

cn: 我能不能问个问题，因为我对这个真的很感兴趣。

en: Stop asking questions! You should know when enough is enough.
cn: 别问问题了！你应该知道什么时候该适可而止。

en: He knew the nomination was his for the asking.

cn: 他常不招人待见，而且被看作是个自负的大傻帽儿。

cn: 生活总是让我们遍体鳞伤，但到后来，那些受伤的地方会变得更坚强。

cn: 我们活着是为了什么？不就是给邻居当笑柄，再反过来笑他们。

cn: 你需要尽你所能，最大限度地去努力。只要你这么做，只要你能保持乐观，你就会看见乌云背后的幸福线。

cn: 他用纸巾将血迹擦去。

cn: 把糖掺入黄油然后搅拌至滑软细腻。

cn: 在昨天的比赛中,瑞士队以2比1战胜了美国队.

cn: 因为正在使用很多昂贵的设备，所以我非常紧张。

cn: 有些段落他演奏得异常徐缓，听上去有些忧伤。

cn: 我和父亲断绝了关系，因为我想成为一个不一样的自己。

cn: 《古兰经》劝告人们在朝圣前斋戒，以作为一种补赎。

cn: 他打电话给劳拉看她是不是好些了。

cn: 若IBM公司和苹果公司联合将会有什么效果呢？

cn: 如果你是比利·克里斯托的影迷，你会喜爱这部影片。

cn: 这是公狗还是母狗？

cn: 滴水板、水槽和塞孔一定要定期消毒。

cn: 他们差不多快到船边时，一个人影从他们旁边飞奔而过。

en: He found the binoculars and focused them on the boat.
cn: 他找到双筒望远镜，然后调焦对准那艘船看。

en: Bob died of a heart attack, brought on by his lifestyle.
cn: 鲍勃死于由他的生活方式引起的心脏病突发。

en: Bob slid from his chair and lay prone on the floor.
cn: 鲍勃从椅子上滑下来，趴在了地板上。

en: Bob tried the door. To his surprise it opened.
cn: 鲍勃试着推了推门。令他吃惊的是，门竟然开了。

en: His resignation was a body blow to the team.
cn: 他的辞职是对该队的沉重打击。

en: The car passed over the body twice, once backward and then forward.
cn: 那辆车把那人来回轧了两次，先是倒着轧的，再是往前开着轧的。

en: They would like to hand over their financial affairs to another body.
cn: 他们想把自己的财务移交给另一个机构管理。

en: His beautifully illustrated book well attested his love of the university.
cn: 他那本带有精美插图的书见证了他对大学的热爱。

en: A journalist all his life, he's now brought out a book.
cn: 他当了一辈子新闻记者，如今已出了一本书。

en: It remained an exceptionally rare book until it was reprinted in 1918.
cn: 在1918年再版之前，这本书一直非常罕见。

en: He was born and grew up in the Flatbush neighbourhood of Brooklyn.
cn: 他出生在布鲁克林的弗拉特布什一带，并在那儿长大成人。

en: She was born in the middle of a rain storm.
cn: 她出生在一场暴风雨中。

en: Almost 80 percent of the state's residents were born elsewhere.
cn: 该州居民中几乎有80%出生在异地。

en: The boss retains enormous influence by reason of his position.
cn: 老板由于自身的地位而一直有极大的影响力。

en: As the boss began to rant, I stood up and went out.
cn: 老板开始咆哮的时候，我起身走了出去。

en: He seemed to be in direct contact with the Boss.
cn: 他似乎直接和老板联系。

en: The vehicle that permitted both communication and acceptability was social revolution.
cn: 既能实现交流又能被广为接受的手段就是社会革命。

en: They have both behaved very badly and I am very hurt.
cn: 他们俩都很不友善，让我非常难过。

en: Featured are both his classics and his latest creations.
cn: 他的经典作品和最新创作都很独特。

en: Mr Brooke is undoubtedly in a spot of bother.
cn: 布鲁克先生肯定遇到了点小麻烦。

en: I'll drive you back to your hotel later. It's no bother.
cn: 我一会儿会开车把你送回宾馆，举手之劳。

en: The sauce is thick and rich so don't bother trying to diet.
cn: 这个酱汁又浓又香，别费劲节食了。

en: "Telmex" was bought off the government by a group of investors.
cn: 一批投资商从政府手中买下墨西哥电信公司。

en: I went to Brooks Brothers and bought myself a decent shirt.
cn: 我去布鲁克斯兄弟专卖店给自己买了一件体面的衬衫。

en: She bought Ann two bras and six pairs of knickers.
cn: 她给安买了两件胸罩、6条内裤。

en: Patterson pointed toward a plain cardboard box beneath a long wooden table.
cn: 帕特森指着长木桌下的一个普通的纸板箱。

en: Martinez expressed confidence of victory at the ballot box.
cn: 马丁内斯表示了对选举获胜的信心。

en: The film opened to healthy box office receipts before rapidly falling off.
cn: 这部影片的票房收入开始的时候持续上涨，但是后来急剧下降。

en: As a boy he was a Manchester United fan.
cn: 小时候，他是曼联队的球迷。

en: The boy first showed promise as an athlete in grade school.
cn: 这个男孩在上小学的时候就初次显示出成为运动员的潜力。

en: At their approach the little boy scurried away and hid.
cn: 他们走近时，小男孩急忙跑开藏了起来。

en: My boyfriend and I robbed a store and were caught red-handed.
cn: 我和男朋友去抢劫一家商店，被当场逮到了。

en: "They play classic rock'n"roll,' states her boyfriend, "My dad digs them too."
cn: “他们演奏经典摇滚乐，”她的男朋友说道，“我爸爸也喜欢他们。”

en: Lisa was irritated by the slovenly attitude of her boyfriend Sean.
cn: 莉萨对男朋友肖恩吊儿郎当的态度非常恼火。

en: The horrors he experienced are imprinted, perhaps indelibly, in his brain.
cn: 他经历的恐怖事件在他脑海中刻下了深深的，或许是难以磨灭的印记。

en: She has a first-class brain and is a damned good writer.
cn: 她头脑相当灵光，是个非常棒的作家。

en: Hallucination is common in patients who have suffered damage to the brain.
cn: 脑部受损的病人常会产生幻觉。

en: It was feared they could break the Allies' codes.
cn: 恐怕他们会破译盟军的密码。

en: He charged into the crowd. "Break it up," he shouted.
cn: 他冲进人群，大喊道：“散开。”

en: I feel as if I should break into song.
cn: 我觉得自己应该放声歌唱。

en: Breakfast television arrived in British life precisely a decade ago.
cn: 准确地说，早间电视节目于10年前进入英国人的生活。

en: I bet you make breakfast and wash up their plates, too.
cn: 我肯定是你做的早餐并且清洗了他们的餐具。

en: At breakfast next morning my two grandsons were clamouring to go swimming.
cn: 第二天早饭时，我那两个孙子嚷嚷着要去游泳。

en: They were anxious to bring the washing in before it rained.
cn: 他们急于在下雨前把洗好的衣服收进屋子。

en: Changing stresses bring about more cracking and rock deformation.
cn: 不断变化的应力导致更多的断裂和岩石变形。

en: They're trying their best to bring together those separated families.
cn: 他们正尽最大的努力让离散的家人重聚。

en: They broke free and made off in a stolen car.
cn: 他们挣脱后开着一辆偷来的车逃之夭夭。

en: I'm broke, Livy, and I owe a couple of million dollars.
cn: 我破产了，莉薇，而且我欠了几百万美元的债。

en: Two years later he is flat broke and on the dole.
cn: 两年后，他一贫如洗，靠失业救济金生活。

en: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, many are stronger at the broken places.
cn: 生活总是让我们遍体鳞伤，但到后来，那些受伤的地方会变得更坚强。

en: His jaw was broken after he was hit on the head.
cn: 他的头部受重击之后下颌骨折了。

en: Everything breakable had been broken and scattered chaotically about the room.
cn: 房间里能打碎的东西都打碎了，一片狼藉。

en: He shouted at his brother, his neck veins bulging.
cn: 他朝他的兄弟吼叫，脖子上青筋暴突。

en: "I wish I had a little brother," said Daphne wistfully.
cn: “我希望有个小弟弟。”达夫妮伤感地说。

en: Shirley's brother is now a consultant heart surgeon in Sweden.
cn: 雪利的兄弟现在在瑞典做心脏外科高级顾问医师。

en: A journalist all his life, he's now brought out a book.
cn: 他当了一辈子新闻记者，如今已出了一本书。

en: Bob died of a heart attack, brought on by his lifestyle.
cn: 鲍勃死于由他的生活方式引起的心脏病突发。

en: He once again raised his baton and brought in the brass.
cn: 他再次举起指挥棒，让铜管乐部加入进来。

en: The sand martin is a brown bird with white underneath.
cn: 崖沙燕是一种褐羽白腹的鸟。

en: Ernest Brown lives about a dozen blocks from where the riots began.
cn: 欧内斯特·布朗住在离骚乱发生处几个街区远的地方。

en: Ms Brown is still no shoo-in for the November election.
cn: 布朗夫人在11月的选举中仍然没有十足的胜算。

en: Hey, no way, buddy.
cn: 嘿，没门儿，老兄。

en: an old college buddy of mine
cn: 我的一位老校友

en: Get out of my way, buddy!
cn: 别挡道了, 你这家伙!

en: He slewed the car against the side of the building.
cn: 他的车滑到了大楼的一侧，抵住了。

en: The building he was lodged in turned out to be a church.
cn: 原来，他租住的那栋建筑是一座教堂。

en: Sloping walls on the bulk of the building create an optical illusion.
cn: 大楼主体的斜墙给人造成一种视错觉。

en: All the rest I said, all that was bullshit.
cn: 我说的其余那些全部都是废话。

en: Don't bullshit me, Brian!
cn: 别骗我，布赖恩！

en: Don't try to bullshit me!
cn: 休想哄我！

en: The bus is said to have over-turned and fallen into a ravine.
cn: 据说巴士发生翻车，跌进了峡谷。

en: I never go on the bus into the town.
cn: 我从不坐公共汽车去城里。

en: I saw Louise walking slowly to the bus stop.
cn: 我看见路易丝慢慢地走向公共汽车站。

en: Very likely he'd told them he had American business interests.
cn: 很可能他已经告诉他们自己拥有美国商业利益.

en: He mixed business and pleasure in a perfect and dynamic way.
cn: 他以互动的方式将工作和娱乐完美地结合起来。

en: The Jamaica Festival is planning a series of workshops and business seminars.
cn: 牙买加节正在筹划一系列研习班和商务研讨会。

en: There has been a busy start to polling in today's local elections.
cn: 今天地方选举的投票一开始就人头攒动。

en: The ward was busy and Amy hardly had time to talk.
cn: 病房里非常忙碌，埃米几乎没有时间说话。

en: I had a busy day and was rather tired.
cn: 今天很忙，我累坏了。

en: A miracle is something that seems impossible but happens anyway.
cn: 奇迹就是看似不可能，却发生了。

en: For what do we live, but to make sport for our neighbours, and laugh at them in our turn?
cn: 我们活着是为了什么？不就是给邻居当笑柄，再反过来笑他们。

en: English has hurt me a thousand times, but I still regard it as my first love.
cn: 英语伤我千百遍，我待英语如初恋。

en: Somehow, he'd managed to persuade Kay to buy one for him.
cn: 不知用了什么方法，他成功说服凯给他买了一个。

en: I might buy one for a friend's birthday as a giggle.
cn: 我可能会买一件送给朋友当生日礼物，逗他开心。

en: Who wants to buy a computer from a failing company?
cn: 谁愿意从一家要倒闭的公司买计算机呢？

en: Doctors are complaining about being barraged by drug-company salesmen.
cn: 医生们抱怨他们疲于应付医药公司的销售人员。

en: He was hand-picked for this job by the Admiral.
cn: 他是由海军上将精心挑选出来担任这项工作的。

en: Barry had his nose put out of joint by Lucy's aloof sophistication.
cn: 露西的冷淡与世故使得巴里十分不快。

en: He stood mournfully at the gate waving bye bye.
cn: 他伤心地站在门口，挥手告别。

en: Dickens felt compelled to return to the stage for a final good-bye.
cn: 迪肯斯觉得必须返回舞台作最后的道别。

en: Bye Mum, see you in a minute.
cn: 妈妈，一会儿见。

en: You can buy a formulation containing royal jelly, pollen and vitamin C.
cn: 可以买一种含蜂王浆、花粉和维生素C的配方产品。

en: Howe carefully cultivated Daniel C. Roper, the Assistant Postmaster General.
cn: 豪谨慎地和邮政副部长丹尼尔·C.罗珀拉近关系。

en: He was put on a high dosage of vitamin C.
cn: 给他服了大剂量的维生素C。

en: Listen here, young lady. Don't you call me that!
cn: 你给我听着，小姐。别那样叫我！

en: Melanie promised that she would call them in the morning.
cn: 梅拉妮许诺第二天上午给他们打电话。

en: They call rowing the perfect sport. It exercises every major muscle group.
cn: 他们称划船是最佳运动，它可以锻炼每一处主要肌肉群。

en: They have been calling the Presidency decision a backroom deal.
cn: 他们称总统人选问题是个幕后交易。

en: I strolled up and down thoughtfully before calling a taxi.
cn: 我踱来踱去仔细思量后叫了一辆出租车。

en: Midge clapped her hands, calling them back to order.
cn: 米奇拍手示意他们安静下来。

en: I want the manager'sjob when he calls it a day.
cn: 等到经理不干了之后，我想接替他的位子。

en: Calls cost 36p (cheap rate) and 48p (peak rate) per minute.
cn: 电话每分钟36便士（优惠费率）和48便士（高峰费率）。

en: Not long afterward she received five calls in one day.
cn: 不久之后，她一天内就接到了5个电话。

en: Officials hoped admitting fewer foreigners would calm the situation.
cn: 官员们希望通过减少外国人入境的数量来使局势平定下来。

en: She sighed, then continued in a soft, calm voice.
cn: 她叹了口气，然后继续用温柔、平静的声音说下去。

en: They may feel tired and though outwardly calm, can be irritable.
cn: 他们或许会感到疲惫，虽然外表看似没事，但可能很容易发火。

en: I was on my own and these fellows came along towards me.
cn: 我正一个人走着，一些家伙朝我走过来。

en: He lived on an invalidity pension which came as a weekly giro.
cn: 他靠每周领取的作为病残养老金的直接转账救济支票过日子。

en: The representatives almost came to blows at a meeting.
cn: 代表们在一次会议上差点动起手来。

en: The happiest are not those who own all the best things, but those who can appreciate the beauty of life.
cn: 最幸福的人们并不一定什么都是最好，只是他们懂得欣赏生活的美好。

en: You have to do everything you can. You have to work your hardest. And if you do, if you stay positive, then you have a shot at a silver lining.
cn: 你需要尽你所能，最大限度地去努力。只要你这么做，只要你能保持乐观，你就会看见乌云背后的幸福线。

en: You can improve your chances of profit by sensible planning.
cn: 你可以通过合理计划来提高盈利的机会。

en: A special locking system means the door cannot be opened accidentally.
cn: 特殊的锁定系统使门不会被意外打开。

en: Since the birds interbreed they cannot be classed as different species.
cn: 由于这些鸟进行杂交繁殖，不能把它们归为不同的物种。

en: The worms cannot be seen by the naked eye.
cn: 这些虫子用肉眼看不见。

en: "Ah, Captain Fox," Martin McGuinness said affably. "Nice to see you again."
cn: “啊，福克斯上尉，”马丁·麦吉尼斯亲切地说，“很高兴再次见到您。”

en: Captain Cook safely navigated his ship without accident for 100 voyages.
cn: 库克船长驾驶的船安全出航100次无事故。

en: Captain David Clement and 150 commandos stormed the port this morning.
cn: 戴维·克莱门特上尉和150名突击队员今天早上对港口展开突袭。

en: He slewed the car against the side of the building.
cn: 他的车滑到了大楼的一侧，抵住了。

en: If you build more plastics into cars, the car lasts longer.
cn: 如果汽车采用更多塑料元件，寿命会更长一些。

en: Their first car rolls off the production line on December 16.
cn: 他们的第一辆车于12月16日下线。

en: They also left a card, imprinted with the name Sean Lynch.
cn: 他们还留下了一张名片，上面印着肖恩·林奇的名字。

en: Come on, Bill. Send Tom a card and make his day.
cn: 来吧，比尔。给汤姆寄张卡片让他高兴高兴吧。

en: Send your details on a card to the following address.
cn: 在明信片上写明你的近况寄到下面的地址。

en: It is nearly always women who are the primary care givers.
cn: 从事初级保健护理工作的几乎都是女性。

en: She denied the murder of four children who were in her care.
cn: 她否认杀害了她所照管的4个孩子。

en: She had met both sons and did not care for either.
cn: 两个儿子她都见了，一个都不喜欢。

en: You have to be careful what you say on telly.
cn: 在电视上说话时你必须很谨慎。

en: Interior decoration by careful coordination seems to have had its day.
cn: 精心搭配的室内装饰似乎已不再受欢迎了。

en: One of the keys to successful business is careful planning.
cn: 打造成功企业的关键之一就是要精心策划。

en: The indisputable fact is that computers carry out logical operations.
cn: 不容置疑的事实是，电脑执行逻辑操作指令。

en: The Navy is to carry out an examination of the wreck tomorrow.
cn: 海军明天将对失事船只进行细查。

en: Many women know how to carry out repairs on their cars.
cn: 许多妇女懂得怎样修自己的车。

en: He actually became convinced that the nurses had an unanswerable case.
cn: 他实际上已经相信了护士们的情况确实如此。

en: He put the case to the Saudi Foreign Minister.
cn: 他把这起事件向沙特外长作了说明。

en: The Government is anxious to keep the whole case out of court.
cn: 政府迫切希望整件事能够在庭外解决。

en: All the bills had the same serial number. The cash was counterfeit.
cn: 所有钞票的序列号都是一样的。这些钱是伪钞。

en: This, after all, is a company which is awash with cash.
cn: 这毕竟是一家现金充裕的公司。

en: The war against drug peddling is all about cash.
cn: 禁毒斗争归根到底是钱的问题。

en: He missed the catch and the match was lost.
cn: 他没有接住球，比赛输了。

en: The teapot came with a stand to catch the drips.
cn: 那把茶壶配有一个可以接滴水的茶托。

en: The white sails billow with the breezes they catch.
cn: 一张张白帆随着微风舞动。

en: He did not like to be caught out on details.
cn: 他不喜欢在细节上被人抓住把柄。

en: If he is caught again he will be given a custodial sentence.
cn: 如果他再次被捕，将会被处以监禁。

en: Any child who is caught will be kept in at playtime.
cn: 凡是被抓住的孩子在课间游戏时要被留在屋里。

en: His misunderstanding of language was the primary cause of his other problems.
cn: 他对语言的误解是引起其他问题的主要原因。

en: Accidents are still the number one cause of premature death for Americans.
cn: 交通事故仍然是造成美国人过早死亡的头号因素。

en: Investment could dry up and that could cause the economy to falter.
cn: 投资可能会中断，而这会引起经济衰退。

en: There is a certain impatience among some of the soldiers.
cn: 有些士兵有点儿不耐烦。

en: Over the years he's demonstrated a certain prescience in foreign affairs.
cn: 这些年来，他已经在外交事务方面表现出一定的预见性。

en: I feel certain that it will all turn out well.
cn: 我觉得最后肯定会皆大欢喜。

en: It is certainly worth checking up on your benefit entitlements.
cn: 查清楚你可以享受哪些福利是绝对有必要的。

en: My audience certainly isn't the proverbial man in the street.
cn: 我的观众当然不是街上的平头百姓。

en: He has almost certainly blown his chance of touring India this winter.
cn: 他几乎肯定失去了今冬去印度旅行的机会。

en: He sat penitently in his chair by the window.
cn: 他懊悔地坐在靠窗的椅子上。

en: Bob slid from his chair and lay prone on the floor.
cn: 鲍勃从椅子上滑下来，趴在了地板上。

en: Use your lunch hour to have a nap in your chair.
cn: 利用午饭时间坐在椅子上打个盹吧。

en: They had met by chance at university and finished up getting married.
cn: 他们在大学偶遇，最后结了婚。

en: If cancers are spotted early there'sa high chance of survival.
cn: 如果癌症在早期发现的话，存活的几率会很高。

en: He did not get a chance to deepen his knowledge of Poland.
cn: 他没有机会更深入地了解波兰。

en: These large institutions make — and change—the rules to suit themselves.
cn: 这些大机构总是随意制定规定，而且说变就变。

en: 1998 was an important year for everyone: a time of change.
cn: 1998年对所有人来说都是重要的一年：那是个变革的时期。

en: Eisenhower used his muscle to persuade Congress to change the law.
cn: 艾森豪威尔用他的影响力说服国会修改了该项法律。

en: But legal experts are not sure if such a charge can stick.
cn: 但法律专家们不能肯定这一指控是否成立。

en: Customers who arrange overdrafts will face a monthly charge of £5.
cn: 透支的客户每月要缴纳5英镑的费用。

en: He has admitted the charge and will be sentenced later.
cn: 他已经认罪，会在晚些时候宣判。

en: Check the oil at regular intervals, and have the car serviced regularly.
cn: 定期检查汽油，并对车辆进行定期维护。

en: Someone comes in every day to check all is in order.
cn: 每天都有人来检查是否一切都井然有序。

en: Sex education is also expected to help check the spread of AIDS.

cn: “没错，梅格。”他用冰冷、阴沉的声音答道。

en: Outside, Bruce glanced at his watch: "Dear me, nearly oneo'clock."
cn: 出了门，布鲁斯瞥了一眼自己的手表，“天哪，快一点了。”

en: "Could I have a word?" — "Oh dear, if you must."
cn: “我能说一句吗？”——“亲爱的，如果你非说不可的话，好吧。”

en: I made for the life raft and hung on for dear life.
cn: 我游到救生筏前，死命地抓住它。

en: It was a crime of espionage and carried the death penalty.
cn: 这是间谍罪，应判死刑。

en: A young man plunged from a sheer rock face to his death.
cn: 一名男青年从陡峭的岩壁上坠崖身亡。

en: Bishop Daly said he was devastated by news of the Cardinal's death.
cn: 戴利主教说他听到红衣主教去世的消息后感到极为震惊和难过。

en: The economy remains deep in recession with few signs of a pick-up.
cn: 经济仍深陷衰退之中，几乎没有好转的迹象。

en: Solid low-level waste will be disposed of deep underground.
cn: 放射性水平低的固体废料将做地下深埋处理。

en: Deep down, she supported her husband'sinvolvement in the organization.
cn: 在心底里，她支持丈夫参加这个组织。

en: We definitely wanted to salvage some pride for British tennis.
cn: 我们当然想为英国网球挽回一些尊严。

en: His opponents believe he is definitely on the run.
cn: 对手认为他必败无疑。

en: Acting is definitely a young person's profession in many ways.
cn: 从许多方面来说，表演无疑是吃青春饭的行当。

en: She was the only woman in Shell's legal department.
cn: 她是壳牌公司法律事务部唯一的女性。

en: Officials at the State Department say the issue is urgent.
cn: 国务院官员说该问题很急迫。

en: She appears nightly on the television news, speaking for the State Department.
cn: 她作为国务院的发言人，每晚都会出现在电视新闻中。

en: "Once a detective, always a detective," he said lightly.
cn: “一日为侦探，终生为侦探，”他满不在意地说。

en: I don't have to be a detective to figure that out.
cn: 我不是侦探也想得出。

en: Joan Smith's detective stories are a cut above the rest.
cn: 琼·史密斯的侦探小说比其他侦探小说都要出色。

en: He did not like to be caught out on details.
cn: 他不喜欢在细节上被人抓住把柄。

en: Well, at any rate, let me thank you for all you did.
cn: 好吧，不管怎样，还是要感谢你所做的一切。

en: The blame for the Charleston fiasco did not lie with him.
cn: 查尔斯顿惨败错不在他。

en: He won his first Derby on the aptly named "Never Say Die".
cn: 他驾驭着这匹名副其实的“永不言败”夺得了他的第一个德比马赛冠军。

en: You stay here, you die. No two ways about it.
cn: 你若留在这里，必死无疑。

en: A new study proved conclusively that smokers die younger than non-smokers.
cn: 一项新的研究确证了吸烟者比不吸烟者死得早。

en: Bob died of a heart attack, brought on by his lifestyle.
cn: 鲍勃死于由他的生活方式引起的心脏病突发。

en: Markov died after being struck by a poison dart.
cn: 马尔科夫身中毒镖而亡。

en: He died in a nursing home at the age of 87.
cn: 他在一家养老院去世，享年87岁。

en: The difference between who you are and who you want to be is what you do.
cn: 你是什么样的人和你想成为什么样的之间的差距就是，你做了什么。

en: There has always been a difference between community radio and commercial radio.
cn: 社区广播电台和商业广播电台一直是有区别的。

en: For a beach resort with a difference, try Key West.
cn: 如果想去一个与众不同的海滨度假胜地，那就去基韦斯特吧。

en: Things might have been different if I'd talked a bit more.
cn: 如果当时我再多说一点的话，结果或许会不一样。

en: Since the birds interbreed they cannot be classed as different species.
cn: 由于这些鸟进行杂交繁殖，不能把它们归为不同的物种。

en: These expressions are often used interchangeably, but they do have different meanings.
cn: 这些表达方式经常相互替代使用，但它们的含义确实有所不同。

en: He had a reputation for being bloody-minded and difficult.
cn: 他为人刻薄、难相处是出了名的。

en: I have a fair idea of how difficult things can be.
cn: 我大致了解情况会有多困难。

en: It would be difficult to find two men who were more dissimilar.
cn: 很难找到彼此间差异更大的人了。

en: Guess what? I'm going to dinner at Mrs. Combley's tonight.
cn: 你猜怎么着？今晚我要去康伯利夫人家里赴宴。

en: "Let's invite her to dinner." — "Over my dead body!"
cn: “我们请她来吃晚饭吧。”——“除非我死了！”

en: He asked for a glass of port after dinner.
cn: 晚饭后，他要了一杯波尔图葡萄酒。

en: Michael gave him a dirty look and walked out.
cn: 迈克尔狠狠地瞪了他一眼然后走开了。

en: He'd put his dirty laundry in the clothes basket.
cn: 他会把自己的脏衣服扔进洗衣篮里。

en: They chased down the stairs into the narrow, dirty street.
cn: 他们冲下楼梯，来到狭窄、肮脏的街上。

en: Beauty is an attitude. It has nothing to do with age.
cn: 美是一种态度，与年龄无关。

en: The best thing to do when entering unknown territory is smile.
cn: 踏入未知地带最好的对策就是微笑。

en: Failure is never quite so frightening as regret.
cn: 比失败更令人恐惧的是懊悔。

en: If your skin becomes red, sore or very scaly, consult your doctor.
cn: 如果皮肤发红、瘙痒或脱皮，要向医生咨询。

en: Doctor believed that his low sperm count was the problem.
cn: 医生认为他的精子数太低是问题所在。

en: The athlete is checked by their physio or doctor.
cn: 由专用理疗师或医生为运动员做检查。

en: He does deserve some good luck after so much wretchedness.
cn: 经过这么多苦难之后，他应该行点好运了。

en: Does this dress make my legs look too stumpy?
cn: 这条裙子会使我的腿看上去又短又粗吗？

en: He sweeps up and does a few odds and ends.
cn: 他扫完地，又干了几样杂活儿。

en: Politicians want a lap-dog press which will uncritically report their propaganda.
cn: 政客们想要的是不问是非、甘为他们搞宣传的哈巴狗一样的新闻媒体。

en: With a snarl, the second dog made a dive for his heel.
cn: 伴着一声嗥叫，第二只狗扑向了他的脚后跟。

en: As soon as he got inside, the dog shook himself.
cn: 他一进来，狗就开始摇头摆尾。

en: She laboured under the illusion that I knew what I was doing.
cn: 她有一个错觉，以为我知道自己在做什么。

en: It is a sneaky and underhand way of doing business.
cn: 这种做生意的方式偷偷摸摸，遮遮掩掩。

en: On her own ground she knows exactly what she's doing.
cn: 她在自己熟悉的领域里对自己的行为有十足的把握。

en: If you're not satisfied with the life you're living, don't just complain. Do something about it.
cn: 对于现况的不满，不能只是抱怨，要有作出改变。

en: I don't want any more of that heavy stuff.
cn: 我再也不想碰那种麻烦事了。

en: Don't worry. We'll have you out of here double-quick.
cn: 别担心，我们会很快把你从这儿弄出去的。

en: I feel it's done me good to get it off my chest.
cn: 我感觉吐吐苦水对我有好处。

en: This can be done if you proceed as follows.
cn: 按照如下操作即可完成。

en: Children at school receive coloured stars for work well done.
cn: 学校里的孩子表现得好会得到彩色星星。

en: She went directly to Simon's apartment and knocked on the door.
cn: 她直奔西蒙的房间，敲了敲门。

en: A special locking system means the door cannot be opened accidentally.
cn: 特殊的锁定系统使门不会被意外打开。

en: The savoury smell greeted them as they went through the door.
cn: 他们进门时一阵香味扑鼻而来。

en: Don't worry. We'll have you out of here double-quick.
cn: 别担心，我们会很快把你从这儿弄出去的。

en: The newspaper used the neologism "dinks", Double Income No Kids.
cn: 报纸使用了新词“丁克族”，即“双收入无子女”。

en: Both offer excellent value at around £90 for a double room.
cn: 两家的双人客房都报出了大约90英镑的超值价格。

en: There can be little doubt that he will offend again.
cn: 毋庸置疑他还会再犯的。

en: They have the usual quota of human weaknesses, no doubt.
cn: 毫无疑问，他们身上也有人所共有的弱点。

en: This new information does throw doubt on their choice.
cn: 这个新信息确实使人们对他们的选择产生了怀疑。

en: She dusted herself down and left to build her own career.
cn: 她重振旗鼓去开创自己的事业了。

en: Try to support each other when one of you is feeling down.
cn: 当有人觉得情绪低落时，要努力相互打气。

en: One of the office girls was down with the flu.
cn: 一位女职员得了流感。

en: Dr. Johnson and I have been trying to build him up physically.
cn: 约翰逊医生和我一直试图增强他的体质。

en: Poor Dr Pegler got terribly behindhand with his appointments.
cn: 可怜的佩格勒博士大大落后于当初的约定。

en: Dr Ryan travelled the world gathering material for his book.
cn: 瑞安博士周游世界为他的书搜集资料。

en: When the right woman comes along, this bad dream will be over.
cn: 当有合适的女人出现时，这种胡思乱想就会停止了。

en: In a dream you can be transported back in time.
cn: 在梦里你可以回到过去。

en: It's as if I'm living in a hazy dream world.
cn: 我好像生活在缥缈的梦境里。

en: Does this dress make my legs look too stumpy?
cn: 这条裙子会使我的腿看上去又短又粗吗？

en: Maria wore a layered white dress that rustled when she moved.
cn: 玛丽亚穿一袭白色节裙，一动裙子就窸窣作响。

en: Each dress is hemmed and scrupulously checked for imperfections.
cn: 每条连衣裙都缝上了褶边，并经过严格的检查，不允许有任何瑕疵。

en: They drink bitter on draught in the local bar.
cn: 他们在当地的酒吧里喝桶装的苦啤酒。

en: She lifted the last of her drink to her lips.
cn: 她将最后一点饮料送到唇边。

en: She could ring for food and drink, laundry and sundry services.
cn: 她可以打电话点餐，叫人来取要洗的衣服以及叫其他各种服务。

en: I don't drive and the buses are quite hopeless.
cn: 我不开车，公共汽车条件又太糟糕。

en: There are certain things he does that drive me mad.
cn: 他的某些举动让我很生气。

en: The ANC is about to launch a nationwide recruitment drive.
cn: 非洲国民大会打算在全国范围内发起招募运动。

en: Driving a boat is not the same as driving a car.
cn: 驾船和开车不是一回事。

en: It was clear Cohen didn't understand what Millard was driving at.
cn: 看得出科恩并不明白米勒德想说什么。

en: It transpired that Paolo had left his driving licence at home.
cn: 后来才知道保罗把驾照忘在家里了。

en: Drop the dough onto a baking sheet with a teaspoon.
cn: 用茶匙把生面团舀到烤盘上。

en: I let the horse drop his head to crop the spring grass.
cn: 我让马低下头啃吃春天的青草。

en: Daddy called and asked me to drop by his office.
cn: 爸爸打来电话让我去他办公室一趟。

en: "Tired and emotional" is a code word for being drunk.
cn: “又累又激动”是形容人喝醉酒的一种委婉说法。

en: Some people moved in silky, liquid movements, others were jerky, probably drunk.
cn: 一些人动作平稳流畅，其他人则跌跌撞撞，大概是喝醉了。

en: The landlord refused to serve him because he considered him too drunk.
cn: 酒吧老板觉得他已经喝多了，拒绝再给他添酒。

en: "Dude" is a cracker of an album.
cn: 《Dude》是一个非常棒的专辑。

en: My doctor is a real cool dude.
cn: 我的医生实在是一位酷男。

en: He's a real cool dude.
cn: 他真是个帅哥。

en: They clocked off duty and left at ten to three.
cn: 他们打卡下班，于2点50分离开。

en: The first duty of a director is to recce his location.
cn: 主管的第一项任务是熟悉所在地区的情况。

en: He had a third examination and was declared unfit for duty.
cn: 他接受了第三次检查，被告知不宜上班。

en: She spent a period of time working with people dying of cancer.
cn: 她有一段时间曾帮助垂危的癌症患者。

en: But that doesn't mean this brand of politics is dead or dying.
cn: 但那并不意味着这种政治主张已经或正在消亡。

en: Persons dying from cancer grow thin and visibly waste away.
cn: 因患癌症濒临死亡的人会日渐消瘦，而且身体明显衰弱。

en: His voice was harsh as he enunciated each word carefully.
cn: 他一字一顿，听上去很生硬。

en: She planted a kiss on each of his leathery cheeks.
cn: 她在他粗糙的面颊上左右各吻了一下。

en: Try to support each other when one of you is feeling down.
cn: 当有人觉得情绪低落时，要努力相互打气。

en: Early American weathervanes were most often cut from flat wooden boards.
cn: 美国早期的风向标大多截自平直的木板。

en: Ethiopia'sart springs from her early Christian as well as her Muslim heritage.
cn: 埃塞俄比亚的艺术起源于其早期的基督教和伊斯兰教文化遗产。

en: A Delta II rocket was launched from Cape Canaveral early this morning.
cn: 今天一早，一枚“德尔塔”Ⅱ型火箭在卡纳维拉尔角发射升空。

en: I was shocked, brought down to earth by this revelation.
cn: 真相的披露让我深感震惊，我被带回了现实。

en: They would move heaven and earth to stop me if they could.
cn: 可能的话，他们会千方百计地阻止我。

en: Weather satellites have observed a ring of volcanic ash girdling the earth.
cn: 气象卫星观测到一个环绕地球的火山灰带。

en: It is easy to appreciate the craftsmanship of Armani.
cn: 阿玛尼的精致工艺很容易博得人们的赞誉。

en: This delicious variation on an omelette is quick and easy to prepare.
cn: 这种稍加变化的可口煎蛋卷做起来又快又容易。

en: Once he knew his father's name, finding his whereabouts proved surprisingly easy.
cn: 一旦他知道了父亲的名字，查找他父亲的下落就变得出奇地容易。

en: It makes sense to eat a reasonably balanced diet when slimming.
cn: 在减肥过程中保持饮食的营养相对均衡是明智的。

en: Jovial ladies chivvy you into ordering more than you can eat!
cn: 热情的女招待会一再推荐，最后点的餐多到吃不下!

en: Because you're not burning calories, everything you eat turns to fat.
cn: 由于没有消耗卡路里，你吃的所有东西都会变成脂肪。

en: Eating in East Berlin used to be a hazardous and joyless experience.
cn: 在东柏林就餐曾经是一件危险而且沉闷无趣的事情。

en: A man-eating lion is on the loose somewhere in England.
cn: 英格兰有一头吃人的狮子跑出来了。

en: We don'tlike paying through the nose for our wine when eating out.
cn: 下馆子时，我们不喜欢在酒水上花很多钱。

en: The newly discover-ed notes are nothing more than Lang's personal journal.
cn: 新发现的笔记只不过是朗的个人日志。

en: You have a choice of co-ed or single-sex swimming exercise classes.
cn: 可以选择男女兼收或是分班的游泳课。

en: Ed played at being a pirate.
cn: 埃德扮海盗玩。

en: The builders have perched a light concrete dome on eight slender columns.
cn: 建筑工人在8根细柱上架起轻巧的混凝土穹顶。

en: Charlie was earning eight pounds, I was earning five.
cn: 查利赚了8英镑，我赚了5英镑。

en: The French, who led 21-3 at half time, scored eight tries.
cn: 上半场以21：3领先的法国队有8个达阵得分。

en: She had met both sons and did not care for either.
cn: 两个儿子她都见了，一个都不喜欢。

en: He seems either to fear women or to sentimentalize them.
cn: 他似乎要么怕女人要么就对她们怀有浪漫想法。

en: On either side of the tracks the ground fell away sharply.
cn: 跑道两侧都是很陡的斜坡。

en: I denied my father because I wanted to become someone else.
cn: 我和父亲断绝了关系，因为我想成为一个不一样的自己。

en: So, if we could just move onto something else?
cn: 那么我们可不可以干脆谈点别的？

en: She has done more to divide the Conservatives than anyone else.
cn: 她在分裂保守党这件事上所起的作用比任何人都大。

en: The agreement has raised hopes that the war may end soon.
cn: 那项协议使人们感到战争有望很快结束。

en: Rationing had put an end to a surfeit of biscuits long ago.
cn: 定量供应很久以前就结束了饼干过剩的状况。

en: He had wandered to the far end of the room.
cn: 他转到屋子的那一头。

en: English has hurt me a thousand times, but I still regard it as my first love.
cn: 英语伤我千百遍，我待英语如初恋。

en: The papers in maths and English are very testing.
cn: 数学试卷和英语试卷很难。

en: Why are Geography, Drama, Art and English in the ascendant?
cn: 为什么地理、戏剧、艺术和英语逐渐受宠？

en: I enjoy pleasure as much as the next person.
cn: 我和别人一样愉快。

en: Boys and girls will enjoy messing about with any kind of machine.
cn: 男孩和女孩会喜欢摆弄各种机械装置。

en: I have been a shooter for 16 years and enjoy my sport.
cn: 我从事射击运动已经16年了，很喜爱这项运动。

en: Three hundred million dollars will be nothing like enough.
cn: 3亿美元远远不够。

en: The plan is good; the problem is it doesn't go far enough.
cn: 计划不错；问题在于不够深入。

en: America has enough firepower in the area to mount sustained air strikes.
cn: 美国在该地区拥有足够的火力发动持续的空中打击。

en: If the Commission has its way, the entire deal will be scuppered.
cn: 如果委员会我行我素的话，整个交易将化为泡影。

en: In his long career at BP, Horton turned around two entire divisions.
cn: 霍顿在英国石油公司漫长的职业生涯中曾经让两个部门整体上起死回生。

en: They feared that totalitarians might yet conquer the entire world.
cn: 他们担心极权主义者会征服整个世界。

en: All colour fades— especially under the impact of direct sunlight.
cn: 所有颜色都会褪色——尤其是在阳光直射下。

en: He was disinclined to talk about himself, especially to his students.
cn: 他不喜欢谈论他自己，尤其是当着他学生的面。

en: Try to view situations more objectively, especially with regard to work.
cn: 要尽量客观地分析情况，尤其是在工作上。

en: Friendship means understanding, not agreement. It means forgiveness, not forgetting.It means the memories last, even if contact is lost.
cn: 友情是理解，不是妥协；是原谅，不是遗忘。即使不联系，感情依然在。

en: He once told an interviewer that he didn't even like rock music.
cn: 他曾告诉一位采访者，他甚至都不喜欢摇滚乐。

en: Some girls may first ovulate even before they menstruate.
cn: 一些女孩的第一次排卵甚至可能出现在初潮之前。

en: The most pleasurable experience of the evening was the wonderful fireworks display.
cn: 这个晚上最让人高兴的就是精彩的焰火表演。

en: It was just gone 7 o'clock this evening when I finished.
cn: 今晚我做完的时候刚过7点。

en: The evening show was terrible, with hesitant unsure performances from all.
cn: 晚上的演出很糟，所有人都缩手缩脚，显得很不自信。

en: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.
cn: 努力过，失败过，没关系，屡战屡败，屡败屡战，每一次失败都比上一次更好。

en: I have $100m hidden away where no one will ever find it.
cn: 我把1亿美元藏到了一个永远没人会找到的地方。

en: I can never, ever forgive him. I despise him.
cn: 我永远不会原谅他。我鄙视他。

en: Someone comes in every day to check all is in order.
cn: 每天都有人来检查是否一切都井然有序。

en: You should wash your feet and your privates every day.
cn: 应该每天洗脚，并清洗阴部。

en: Naomi used to go to church in Granville every Sunday.
cn: 娜奥米以前每个星期天都去格兰维尔的教堂做礼拜。

en: The minute that the war started, everybody was glued to the television.

en: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, many are stronger at the broken places.

en: 1998 was an important year for everyone: a time of change.
cn: 1998年对所有人来说都是重要的一年：那是个变革的时期。

cn: 到20岁时，他就会认识华盛顿所有值得认识的人。

en: Because you're not burning calories, everything you eat turns to fat.

en: He'd telephoned with some phoney excuse she didn't believe for a minute.

cn: 连它妈的小家雀儿都一对一对儿的, 不许咱们成家!

cn: 不管你生活在哪里，你有多少岁，总有新东西要学习，毕竟，生活总是充满惊喜。

cn: 埃米举起胳膊挥挥手。“再见，”她喊道。

en: She's got a great voice and is singing better than ever.

cn: 房间仍然很简朴，四面都是饰有圆点的绿色空墙。

cn: 已开发土地的面积将从5.3%增加到6.9%。
