en: This guy, Jack Smith, does he go by the name of Jackal?
cn: 这个叫杰克·史密斯的家伙是不是还有个名字叫杰凯尔？

en: Guy Powell, defending, told magistrates: "It's a sad and disturbing case."
cn: 盖伊·鲍威尔在进行辩护时对地方法官说道：“这是一件非常不幸、令人不安的案子。”

en: He claims he was made the fall guy for the affair.
cn: 他声称自己是这起事件的替罪羊。

en: "Ha, ha," everyone guffawed. "It's one of Viv's shock tactics."
cn: “哈哈，”所有人都大笑起来，“这是维夫的一招出奇制胜的战术。”

en: Schulman is a little tired of the hoo-ha about the all-women team.
cn: 舒尔曼有点厌烦了对全女子队的过度炒作。

en: "Ha!" It was a cross between a laugh and a bark.
cn: “哈！”那声音听起来既像在笑又像在叫。

en: The house seemed muted, hushed as if it had been deserted.
cn: 房子里似乎悄然无声，安静得好像已经没人在住一样。

en: I had obtained the authentic details about the birth of the organization.
cn: 我已经掌握了有关该组织诞生的可靠的详细资料。

en: Barry had his nose put out of joint by Lucy's aloof sophistication.
cn: 露西的冷淡与世故使得巴里十分不快。

en: She walked forward and embraced him and stroked his tousled white hair.
cn: 她走上前拥抱他并轻抚他凌乱的白发。

en: Applying the dye can be messy, particularly on long hair.
cn: 涂抹染发剂可能会搞得一团糟，特别是长发。

en: His long, uncovered hair flew back in the wind.
cn: 他那露在外面的长发随风向后飞舞。

en: Elliott crossed the finish line just half a second behind his adversary.
cn: 埃利奥特跨过终点线时仅比对手落后半秒钟。

en: She'd half expected him to withdraw from the course.
cn: 她多少已经预料到他会中途就退出这门课程。

en: The French, who led 21-3 at half time, scored eight tries.
cn: 上半场以21：3领先的法国队有8个达阵得分。

en: The entrance hall is littered with toys and wellington boots.
cn: 门厅里到处乱扔着玩具和雨靴。

en: Wes Hall was once one of the West Indies' great cricketers.
cn: 韦斯·霍尔曾经是西印度群岛伟大的板球运动员之一。

en: His excellency the President will be waiting for you in the hall.
cn: 总统阁下会在大厅等你。

en: He was hand-picked for this job by the Admiral.
cn: 他是由海军上将精心挑选出来担任这项工作的。

en: Without warning, Bardo smacked his fist into his open hand.
cn: 巴多没有任何预兆地一拳砸在自己摊开的手掌上.

en: All this, needless to say, had been culled second-hand from radio reports.
cn: 不用说，所有这些都是从电台报道中采集来的二手材料。

en: The public never had faith in his ability to handle the job.
cn: 公众从来不相信他有能力胜任这一职位。

en: Our plan is to allocate one member of staff to handle appoint-ments.
cn: 我们的计划是分派一位职员处理预约事宜。

en: Don't take on more responsibilities than you can handle.
cn: 不要承担过多的责任。

en: The King has merely given the politicians enough rope to hang themselves.
cn: 国王只不过是给了这些政客自缚的绳子。

en: If we give her enough rope, she will hang herself.
cn: 如果我们让她为所欲为，她一定会栽大跟头的。

en: They are getting the hang of it very quickly.
cn: 他们很快就会找到窍门。

en: Remember, keep a positive attitude and good things will happen.
cn: 记住：保持乐观的心态，好事自然会发生。

en: Do not wait for good things to happen to you. You need to walk towards happiness.
cn: 不要等待好事降临，你要向幸福进发。

en: This is such an unforeseeable situation that anything could happen.
cn: 这种情况很难预测，什么事都有可能发生。

en: Quite a few people were milling about, but nothing was happening.
cn: 有不少人在附近转来转去，可是什么事情也没有发生。

en: This is happening in every school throughout the country.
cn: 全国各地每所学校都在发生这样的事情。

en: So what is really happening as the information bandwagon starts to roll?
cn: 当信息大潮滚滚而来的时候究竟发生了些什么呢？

en: She has now changed into a happy, self-confident woman.
cn: 如今她已经变成一个快乐、自信的女人。

en: He was so happy communing with the dolphin in Dingle Bay.
cn: 他在丁格尔湾与海豚交流的时候特别开心。

en: Like the best stories, this one may yet have a happy end.
cn: 就像最精彩的故事那样，这个故事也许仍会有个美好的结局。

en: Talent, hard work and sheer tenacity are all crucial to career success.
cn: 事业要成功，才能、勤奋和顽强的意志都至关重要。

en: The federal government hiked the tax on hard liquor.
cn: 联邦政府提高了烈性酒的税率。

en: People are having to think hard about their holiday plans.
cn: 人们现在得仔细地琢磨自己的度假计划。

en: The ward was busy and Amy hardly had time to talk.
cn: 病房里非常忙碌，埃米几乎没有时间说话。

en: My eyes were so swollen I could hardly see.
cn: 我的眼睛肿得很厉害，几乎看不到东西。

en: Their two faces were hardly more than eighteen inches apart.
cn: 他俩的脸相隔还不到18英寸。

en: Harry inherited the house and a sizeable chunk of land.
cn: 哈里继承了这座房子以及相当大的一片土地。

en: Gail was silent for a moment, regarding Harry with his steady gaze.
cn: 盖尔镇定地注视着哈里，沉默了片刻。

en: The inscription reads: "To Emma, with love from Harry".
cn: 题赠写着：“献给爱玛，爱你的哈里”。

en: Beauty is an attitude. It has nothing to do with age.
cn: 美是一种态度，与年龄无关。

en: English has hurt me a thousand times, but I still regard it as my first love.
cn: 英语伤我千百遍，我待英语如初恋。

en: A changing world has put pressures on the corporation.
cn: 日新月异的世界使这家公司感到了压力。

en: Stan Dean, easily identifiable by his oddly-shaped hat, sat in a doorway.
cn: 斯坦·迪安坐在门口，他那顶奇形怪状的帽子一下子就让人认出他来。

en: This design knocks everything else into a cocked hat.
cn: 这一设计令其他作品相形见绌。

en: She wore a little nurse's hat on her head to identify her.
cn: 她头戴一顶小护士帽，很容易辨认。

en: I hate it when people accuse us of that.
cn: 我讨厌别人就那件事指责我们。

en: I hate to rush you but I have another appointment later on.
cn: 我真不想催你，但我稍后还有一个约会。

en: "A deal!" she said contemptuously, "I hate all deals."
cn: “交易！”她鄙夷地说，“我厌恶一切交易。”

en: You have to do everything you can. You have to work your hardest. And if you do, if you stay positive, then you have a shot at a silver lining.
cn: 你需要尽你所能，最大限度地去努力。只要你这么做，只要你能保持乐观，你就会看见乌云背后的幸福线。

en: Remember, happiness doesn't depend upon who you are or what you have; it depends solely upon what you think.--Dale Carnegie
cn: 请记住，幸福不在于你是谁或者你拥有什么，而仅仅取决于你的心态！

en: They have maintained their optimism in the face of desolating subjugation.
cn: 面对遭征服的悲惨命运，他们保持了乐观的态度。

en: I hope I haven't said anything to upset you.
cn: 但愿我没有说过让你不高兴的话。

en: I haven't come all this way to bottle out.
cn: 我一路走来不是为了在最后关头打退堂鼓。

en: With respect, Minister, you still haven't answered my question.
cn: 部长，恕我冒昧，您还没有回答我的问题。

en: He was well acquainted with the literature of France, Germany and Holland.
cn: 他对于法国、德国和荷兰的文学了如指掌。

en: He said they should turn their fire on the Conservative Party instead.
cn: 他说他们应该掉转枪口，向保守党开火。

en: He knew what he wanted to do from the age of 14.
cn: 他14岁起就知道自己日后干什么了。

en: He won a head-to-head battle with NF leader Jean-Marie Le Pen.
cn: 他在和国民阵线领袖让-马里·勒庞的正面交锋中获得了胜利。

en: I let the horse drop his head to crop the spring grass.
cn: 我让马低下头啃吃春天的青草。

en: His head was swathed in bandages made from a torn sheet.
cn: 他的头上缠满了一层层用床单撕成的绷带。

en: "I'm afraid he's ill." — "I'm sorry to hear that."
cn: “恐怕他生病了。”——“真是遗憾。”

en: She could hear his ragged breathing, as if he had been running.
cn: 她能听到他不均匀的呼吸声，似乎他是跑着过来的。

en: "I think I hear the telephone ringing."—"Okay, I can take a hint."
cn: “我想我听到电话铃在响。”——“好的，我明白你的意思了。”

en: He stood emotionless as he heard the judge pass sentence.
cn: 他面无表情地站在那里，听法官宣布判决。

en: Flying at 1,000 ft. he heard a peculiar noise from the rotors.
cn: 在1,000英尺的高度飞行时，他听到旋翼发出一种奇怪的噪音。

en: Rose heard the familiar voice, but tuned out the words.
cn: 罗斯听到了熟悉的声音，但没注意听说的是什么。

en: Bob died of a heart attack, brought on by his lifestyle.
cn: 鲍勃死于由他的生活方式引起的心脏病突发。

en: Shirley's brother is now a consultant heart surgeon in Sweden.
cn: 雪利的兄弟现在在瑞典做心脏外科高级顾问医师。

en: Her husband had never before had any heart trouble.
cn: 她丈夫以前从来没得过任何心脏疾病。

en: They would move heaven and earth to stop me if they could.
cn: 可能的话，他们会千方百计地阻止我。

en: "For heaven's sake!" Dot expostulated. "They're cheap and they're useful."
cn: “拜托！”多特反驳道，“它们又便宜又管用。”

en: Well, for Heaven's sake, you don't need to apologize.
cn: 噢,看在上天的份上,你不用道歉.

en: Whatever the outcome, it's going to be one hell of a fight.
cn: 不管结果如何，这都会是场艰苦的战斗。

en: The men might be armed, but they sure as hell weren'ttrained.
cn: 这些人可能携有武器，但他们很显然没有受过训练。

en: The children give her hell, particularly the older boys.
cn: 这些孩子让她吃足了苦头，特别是那些年龄大一点的男孩子。

en: I answered the phone and this voice went, "Hello? Is that Alison?"
cn: 我拿起电话，就听到这个声音：“喂？是艾利森吗？”

en: A moment later, Cohen picked up the phone. "Hello?"
cn: 过了一会儿，科恩接起电话。“喂？”

en: "Hello, I don't think we've met," Robert introduced himself.
cn: “你好，我想我们还没有见过吧，”罗伯特自我介绍道。

en: Ellery's return will help to chase away some of the gloom.
cn: 埃勒里的归来可以驱散一些抑郁的情绪。

en: Daily facial exercises help her to retain the skin's elasticity.
cn: 每天做面部运动帮助她保持皮肤弹性。

en: Sheila had an ulterior motive for trying to help Stan.
cn: 希拉想帮助斯坦是另有所图的。

en: Henry generally stayed ahead of the others in the academic subjects.
cn: 亨利的文化课成绩通常都优于其他学生。

en: It would never do to have Henry there in her apartment.
cn: 亨利呆在她的公寓里怎么也不合适。

en: John Henry Williams was a no-show at last week's game in Milwaukee.
cn: 上周在密尔沃基进行的比赛约翰·亨利·威廉斯没有出场。

en: Somehow Karin managed to cope with the demands of her career.
cn: 卡琳设法达到了其职业的要求。

en: In her spare time she read books on cooking.
cn: 业余时间里她看一些烹饪方面的书籍。

en: I recall many discussions with her on these and kindred topics.
cn: 我回想起多次同她就这些问题及类似话题进行的讨论。

en: Here's an inside tip: The faster you rise, the harder you fall.
cn: 给你一个小忠告：爬得越快，摔得越疼。

en: Don't worry. We'll have you out of here double-quick.
cn: 别担心，我们会很快把你从这儿弄出去的。

en: I try to remember all the good times I've had here.
cn: 我试着回忆在这里度过的所有美好时光。

en: She dusted herself down and left to build her own career.
cn: 她重振旗鼓去开创自己的事业了。

en: She is not herself. She came near to a breakdown.
cn: 她身体不舒服，简直要崩溃了。

en: She made a fanning motion, pretending to cool herself off.
cn: 她做了个扇风的动作，假装想让自己凉快一点。

en: "Hey, I don't know what you're talking about," Russo objected.
cn: “喂，我不知道你在说些什么，”拉索反驳道。

en: "Hey, Judith," he resumed, "tell me all about yourself."
cn: “嘿，朱迪思，”他接着说，“跟我谈谈你自己吧。”

en: Hey, I know what, I'll get a bumper sticker printed up.
cn: 嘿，有了，我会找人印刷一些保险杠贴纸。

en: All this equipment has received international acclaim from the specialist hi-fi press.
cn: 这套设备受到全球高保真音响专业报刊的赞誉。

en: "Hello there," said the woman, smiling at them.— 'Hi!' they chorused.
cn: “嘿，你们好！”那个女人笑着对他们说。——“你好！”他们齐声说。

en: Hi! How are you doing?
cn: 嗨！你近来怎么样？

en: You feel an animal panic to run and hide.
cn: 你会感到一种本能的恐惧而想要去逃避。

en: She fancied he was trying to hide a smile.
cn: 她猜想他正在尽力掩饰笑容。

en: Greta Garbo went to great lengths to hide from reporters and photographers.
cn: 葛丽泰·嘉宝想方设法躲开记者和摄影师。

en: Powell's unusual journey to high office is an inspiration to millions.
cn: 鲍威尔升任高官的不寻常历程对数以百万计的人都是一个激励。

en: If cancers are spotted early there'sa high chance of survival.
cn: 如果癌症在早期发现的话，存活的几率会很高。

en: That big high-rise above us is where Brian lives.
cn: 我们上面的那座摩天大楼就是布赖恩住的地方。

en: She studied him for the longest time, looking wryly amused.
cn: 她面带苦笑，盯着他看了很长时间。

en: I would prefer him to be with us next season.
cn: 我更希望他下一个赛季和我们在一起。

en: The blame for the Charleston fiasco did not lie with him.
cn: 查尔斯顿惨败错不在他。

en: He sees himself going right to the top of the tree.
cn: 他预见自己在同行中将无人可及。

en: As soon as he got inside, the dog shook himself.
cn: 他一进来，狗就开始摇头摆尾。

en: He was disinclined to talk about himself, especially to his students.
cn: 他不喜欢谈论他自己，尤其是当着他学生的面。

en: His hands were too weak to cock his revolver.
cn: 他的手没劲儿，扳不动左轮手枪的扳机。

en: Barry had his nose put out of joint by Lucy's aloof sophistication.
cn: 露西的冷淡与世故使得巴里十分不快。

en: He finished his conversation and stood up, looking straight at me.
cn: 他说完话站起来，直视着我。

en: I fell under the influence of a history master.
cn: 我当时深受一位历史老师的影响。

en: The boundaries between history and storytelling are always being blurred and muddled.
cn: 历史和轶闻的分界向来是模糊而混乱的。

en: With apologies to my old history teacher, who needs history lessons?
cn: 这话对不住我亲爱的历史老师，不过有谁需要历史课呢？

en: As I sidestepped, the bottle hit me on the left hip.
cn: 我侧一步要躲闪的时候，瓶子打中了我的左髋部。

en: If something's a sure-fire hit then Radio One will play it.
cn: 如果哪首歌一定会火，那么第一频道肯定会播出。

en: He pushed everyone full speed ahead until production hit a bottleneck.
cn: 他催促所有人拼命干活，直到生产遭遇瓶颈。

en: Shops in Ho Chi Minh City are stacked with goods.
cn: 胡志明市的商店里堆满了商品。

en: My general reaction to this news might be summed up as "ho-hum"
cn: 我对这条消息的总体反应可以用“哼儿哈儿”来概括。

en: Senate Republicans are less gung-ho about tax cuts.
cn: 共和党的参议员对减税并不太热衷。

en: He struggled to hold the bike down on the banked corners.
cn: 拐过斜弯时他竭力将自行车把稳。

en: It is hard to get hold of guns in this country.
cn: 在这个国家里要搞到枪支是很困难的。

en: They can't believe you can even hold a conversation.
cn: 他们不敢相信你竟然能够把一场对话进行下去。

en: The guerrillas were holding out in the Paghman valley.
cn: 游击队员正在帕格曼山谷地区坚持抵抗。

en: He was holding a cloth that dripped pink drops upon the floor.
cn: 他正拿着一块布，布上粉红色的水滴落在地板上。

en: That would increase Olympia & York's holding to 35%.
cn: 那样就会使奥林匹亚约克公司的股份上升到35%。

en: He admitted that the government was in "a dreadful hole".
cn: 他承认政府目前“处境极为尴尬”。

en: Dig a largish hole and bang the stake in first.
cn: 挖一个大点儿的洞，先把木桩敲进去。

en: A plug had been inserted in the drill hole.
cn: 钻孔已塞上了塞子。

en: The discovery is being hailed as The Holy Grail of astronomy.
cn: 这一发现圆了天文学界的一个梦想。

en: Every year they put a play on at Saint Holy Cross Church.
cn: 他们每年在圣十字教堂上演一出剧目。

en: At the festival, candles are blessed and sprinkled with holy water.
cn: 在节日里，要对蜡烛祝圣，并洒以圣水。

en: It had once been the home of a wealthy nobleman.
cn: 这里曾是一个有钱贵族的宅邸。

en: His destination was Chobham Common, a long way from his Cotswold home.
cn: 他的目的地是乔伯姆公地，那里和他在科茨沃尔德的家离得很远。

en: His house was the only settled home I had as a child.
cn: 他的房子是我儿时唯一固定的家。

en: To be honest the house is not quite our style.
cn: 说实话，这所房子不太适合我们。

en: I want to be honest, honest above everything else.
cn: 我想要做到诚实，一切以诚实为上。

en: Fraudsters are often shopped by honest friends and neighbours.
cn: 诈骗犯经常会被正直守法的朋友和邻居告发。

en: Add more honey if you have a sweet tooth.
cn: 如果你喜欢吃甜的就多加点蜂蜜。

en: Now don't talk so loud and bother him, honey.
cn: 亲爱的，好了，别这么大声说话打扰他。

en: Sweeten dishes sparingly with honey, or con-centrated apple or pear juice.
cn: 加一点蜂蜜或浓缩苹果汁或梨汁，让菜带点甜味。

en: The Chinese make a point of their personal honor.
cn: 中国人特别重视个人荣誉.

en: I feel honor bound to repay the money I borrowed.
cn: 我觉得有责任归还我借的钱.

en: It's quite an honor to have two men fighting over me.
cn: 有两个人争着要我,我感到很荣幸.

en: The arteries are diseased and a transplant is the only hope.
cn: 动脉已经发生病变，移植是唯一的希望。

en: I hope I haven't said anything to upset you.
cn: 但愿我没有说过让你不高兴的话。

en: I do hope you'll forgive me but I've got to leave.
cn: 我真的非常抱歉，我得走了。

en: I let the horse drop his head to crop the spring grass.
cn: 我让马低下头啃吃春天的青草。

en: Representatives from across the horse industry will attend the meeting.
cn: 整个赛马业的代表都将参加这次会议。

en: Last night we hitched the horse to the cart and moved here.
cn: 昨晚我们套上马车，拉着东西搬到了这里。

en: You are welcome to visit the hospital at any time.
cn: 你可以随时来医院。

en: They were taken to hospital suffering from smoke inhalation.
cn: 他们因吸入大量烟尘被送往医院。

en: I should point out that these estimates cover just the hospital expenditures.
cn: 我应该指出，这些估算仅包括医院的费用。

en: Wash your hands thoroughly with hot soapy water before handling any food.
cn: 在拿吃的之前，用热肥皂水把手好好地洗干净。

en: Across the busy plaza, vendors sell hot dogs and croissant sandwiches.
cn: 在热闹广场的另一边，摊贩叫卖着热狗和羊角三明治。

en: The hot liquid splashed down on the concrete and rebounded.
cn: 滚烫的液体泼在水泥地面上又溅了起来。

en: The hotel is set plumb in the middle of the high street.
cn: 宾馆正好坐落在商街的中段。

en: His team-mates opened hotel windows, shouting "Jump!" and somewhat less printable banter.
cn: 他的队友打开了酒店的窗户，大叫着“跳！”，还开了一些上不了台面的玩笑。

en: Free room and board are provided for all hotel staff.
cn: 宾馆的所有员工都可享受免费膳宿。

en: Use your lunch hour to have a nap in your chair.
cn: 利用午饭时间坐在椅子上打个盹吧。

en: He is impatient as the first hour passes and then another.
cn: 一个小时、两个小时过去了，他不耐烦了。

en: The appointed hour of the ceremony was drawing nearer.
cn: 既定的典礼时间就快到了。

en: The house seemed muted, hushed as if it had been deserted.
cn: 房子里似乎悄然无声，安静得好像已经没人在住一样。

en: Harry inherited the house and a sizeable chunk of land.
cn: 哈里继承了这座房子以及相当大的一片土地。

en: On Sunday Cohen lay around the house all day.
cn: 科恩星期天一整天都在家无所事事。

en: No matter where you go in life or how old you get, there's always something new to learn about. After all, life is full of surprises.
cn: 不管你生活在哪里，你有多少岁，总有新东西要学习，毕竟，生活总是充满惊喜。

en: I know how to darn, and how to sew a button on.
cn: 我会打补丁，缝纽扣。

en: You must have noticed how tired he sometimes looks.
cn: 你一定注意到他有时候显得特别疲惫。

en: Huh? What's going on? You want to tell me what I did?
cn: 啊？怎么了？你要告诉我我刚才做了什么吗？

en: "Oh that one." — "Uh huh."
So you're a runner, huh?
cn: 这么说，你是个跑步爱好者喽？

en: Most of the wine was unfit for human consumption.
cn: 这些酒中大部分都不适于人类饮用。

en: It's an affront to human dignity to keep someone alive like this.
cn: 如此维持一个人的生命是对人类尊严的冒犯。

en: He was concerned with the enhancement of the human condition.
cn: 他关心人类生存环境的改善。

en: Three hundred million dollars will be nothing like enough.
cn: 3亿美元远远不够。

en: Several hundred workers struck in sympathy with their colleagues.
cn: 几百名工人罢工以声援他们的同事。

en: Take a hundred and twenty values and calculate the mean.
cn: 取120个值计算平均数。

en: Come on now. You know you must be hungry.
cn: 好，来吧，你肯定已经饿了。

en: I left Oxford in 1961 hungry to be a critic.
cn: 我于1961年离开牛津，渴望成为一名评论家。

en: I don't know about the rest of you, but I'm hungry.
cn: 我不知道你们怎么样，但我是饿了。

en: Dave was in a hurry to get back to work.
cn: 戴夫急于回到工作岗位。

en: Petter saw no reason to hurry the divorce along.
cn: 彼得认为没有必要加速离婚进程。

en: Patrick often plays up when he knows I'm in a hurry.
cn: 帕特里克常常明知我手忙脚乱还要调皮捣蛋。

en: English has hurt me a thousand times, but I still regard it as my first love.
cn: 英语伤我千百遍，我待英语如初恋。

en: The turning point in the process of growing up is when you discover the core of strength within you that survives all hurt.--Max Lerner
cn: 当你从内心深处找到一种可以忍受一切痛苦的坚强力量时，你的成长历程就会出现飞跃。

en: They have both behaved very badly and I am very hurt.
cn: 他们俩都很不友善，让我非常难过。

en: Husband and wife are now taxed separately on their incomes.
cn: 现在夫妻双方分别按各自的收入纳税。

en: She feels devalued because she knows her husband has had affairs.
cn: 她觉得自己掉价了，因为她知道丈夫有了外遇。

en: Her husband had never before had any heart trouble.
cn: 她丈夫以前从来没得过任何心脏疾病。

en: For more information concerning the club contact I. Coldwell.
cn: 咨询俱乐部详情，请与I.科德维尔联系。

en: English has hurt me a thousand times, but I still regard it as my first love.
cn: 英语伤我千百遍，我待英语如初恋。

en: I will return, find you, love you, marry you and live without shame.
cn: 我会回去，找到你，爱你，娶你，活的光明正大。

en: His mother's voice was one he knew; ice cold and deadly.
cn: 母亲的声音是他很熟悉的：冰冷、无情。

en: The deal was put on ice for three months.
cn: 该交易被搁置了3个月。

en: The only sound was the crackle of breaking ice.
cn: 唯一的声响是冰层噼噼啪啪碎裂的声音。

en: I have a fair idea of how difficult things can be.
cn: 我大致了解情况会有多困难。

en: They have only a vague idea of the amount of water available.
cn: 他们只是大概知道可用水的总量。

en: Professor Baker is unacquainted with the idea of representative democracy.
cn: 贝克教授并不熟悉“代议制民主”这一思想。

en: He snubbed her in public and made her feel an idiot.
cn: 他当众冷落她，让她觉得自己像一个白痴似的。

en: The original script was written with the idiot box in mind.
cn: 剧本当初就是为电视而写的。

en: Custer was an idiot and a brute and he deserved his fate.
cn: 卡斯特是个白痴，是个残暴的家伙，他罪有应得。

en: If you wait, all that happens is that you get older.
cn: 如果你等待，发生的只有变老。

en: If you love life, life will love you back.
cn: 热爱生活，生活也会厚爱你。(Arthur Rubinstein)

en: If you're not satisfied with the life you're living, don't just complain. Do something about it.
cn: 对于现况的不满，不能只是抱怨，要有作出改变。

en: I would imagine she's quite lonely living on her own.
cn: 我猜想她一个人过肯定很孤独。

en: I imagine they'll be tearing the building down sooner or later.
cn: 我猜他们早晚会拆除这座楼的。

en: Imagine long golden beaches where you can wander in solitude.
cn: 想象一下那长长的金色海滩吧，在那里你可以独自徜徉。

en: Fresh fruits and vegetables are important and so is bran.
cn: 新鲜的水果和蔬菜很重要，麦麸也是。

en: Charlton are about to play an important away match.
cn: 查尔顿队即将在客场进行一场重要比赛。

en: 1998 was an important year for everyone: a time of change.
cn: 1998年对所有人来说都是重要的一年：那是个变革的时期。

en: A miracle is something that seems impossible but happens anyway.
cn: 奇迹就是看似不可能，却发生了。

en: It is impossible to say who struck the fatal blow.
cn: 很难判断是谁给了致命的一击。

en: The government inherited an impossible situation from its predecessors.
cn: 这届政府从前任那里接过了一个非常棘手的烂摊子。

en: No matter where you go in life or how old you get, there's always something new to learn about. After all, life is full of surprises.
cn: 不管你生活在哪里，你有多少岁，总有新东西要学习，毕竟，生活总是充满惊喜。

en: For what do we live, but to make sport for our neighbours, and laugh at them in our turn?
cn: 我们活着是为了什么？不就是给邻居当笑柄，再反过来笑他们。

en: The turning point in the process of growing up is when you discover the core of strength within you that survives all hurt.--Max Lerner
cn: 当你从内心深处找到一种可以忍受一切痛苦的坚强力量时，你的成长历程就会出现飞跃。

en: The room was quiet; no one volunteered any further information.
cn: 房间很安静，无人主动提供更多的信息。

en: As mentioned earlier, the University supplements this information with an interview.
cn: 如前所述，大学将通过面试对这一信息进行补充。

en: If you'd like more information, ring the Hotline on 414 3929.
cn: 如果想了解更多信息，请拨打热线电话4143929。

en: Eventually, you'll learn to cry that on the inside.
cn: 终有一天，你会学会让泪往心里流。

en: Here's an inside tip: The faster you rise, the harder you fall.
cn: 给你一个小忠告：爬得越快，摔得越疼。

en: As soon as he got inside, the dog shook himself.
cn: 他一进来，狗就开始摇头摆尾。

en: Instead of complaining about what's wrong, be grateful for what's right.
cn: 别抱怨不好的事，要对美好的事心存感恩。

en: He said they should turn their fire on the Conservative Party instead.
cn: 他说他们应该掉转枪口，向保守党开火。

en: Instead of moving at his usual stately pace, he was almost running.
cn: 他没像平时那样优雅庄重地走着，而是几乎跑了起来。

en: We have the interest of 500,000 customers to think of.
cn: 我们得为50万名顾客的利益着想。

en: Hopes of an early cut in interest rates bolstered confidence.
cn: 利率有望早日下调，从而增强了人们的信心。

en: Interest rates would come down as the recovery gathered pace.
cn: 随着复苏的加速，利率会降下来。

en: It bothered me that boys weren't interested in me.
cn: 男孩子们对我不感兴趣令我很烦恼。

en: Can I just ask something 'cos I'm really quite interested in this.
cn: 我能不能问个问题，因为我对这个真的很感兴趣。

en: We're interested in the source of these fictitious rumours.
cn: 我们对这些子虚乌有的谣言从何而来很感兴趣。

en: There are interesting hikes inland, but most ramblers stick to the clifftops.
cn: 内陆地区有一些很有意思的徒步远足路线，但多数徒步者都去爬悬崖陡壁。

en: You get an interesting meal for a reasonable price.
cn: 你花不多的钱就可以吃一顿很特别的饭。

en: Don't get me wrong, it's interesting work. But it's not permanent.
cn: 别误会我的意思，这个工作很有意思，可惜不是长期性的。

en: I have tried to pack a good deal into a few words.
cn: 我尽量言简意赅。

en: The enquiry dug deeper into the alleged financial misdeeds of his government.
cn: 这一调查对其政府涉嫌的财政违规行为展开了进一步深究。

en: The light went out, and the room was plunged into darkness.
cn: 灯熄了，屋里陷入一片漆黑。

en: I distinctly remember wishing I had not got involved.
cn: 我清楚地记得希望自己没有被牵扯进去。

en: All senior officers involved in the coup will have to be removed.
cn: 所有参与政变的高级官员都将被免职。

en: She became involved in social and relief work among the refugees.
cn: 她参加了帮助难民的社会救济工作。

en: Beauty is an attitude. It has nothing to do with age.
cn: 美是一种态度，与年龄无关。

en: The best thing to do when entering unknown territory is smile.
cn: 踏入未知地带最好的对策就是微笑。

en: A miracle is something that seems impossible but happens anyway.
cn: 奇迹就是看似不可能，却发生了。

en: Beauty is an attitude. It has nothing to do with age.
cn: 美是一种态度，与年龄无关。

en: English has hurt me a thousand times, but I still regard it as my first love.
cn: 英语伤我千百遍，我待英语如初恋。

en: Success is not guaranteed. It is not handed to you. Success is earned.
cn: 成功无法保证，并非唾手可得。成功必须靠自己去争取。

en: Generosity is its own form of power.
cn: 别低估了慷慨的力量。

en: The council recently drew fire for its intervention in the dispute.
cn: 委员会最近因为介入该起争端而遭到批评。

en: "Kathleen" was, as its 1892 subtitle asserted, "An Irish Drama".
cn: 正如1892年剧本的副标题所强调的，《凯瑟琳》是一部“爱尔兰戏剧”。

en: Last night he was being held in solitary confinement in Douglas jail.
cn: 昨晚他被单独监禁在道格拉斯的监狱里。

en: He's probably going to finish up in jail for business fraud.
cn: 他最后很可能会因为商业诈骗而入狱。

en: In the end the "bad guys" are caught and sent to jail.
cn: 最后，“坏人”都被抓住送进了监狱。

en: James Fox is best known as the author of White Mischief.
cn: 詹姆斯·福克斯以《欲望城》一书最为出名.

en: James wasn't invited. We've been out of touch for years.
cn: 没有邀请詹姆斯，我们已经多年未联系了。

en: James came out of his bedroom, toweling his wet hair.
cn: 詹姆斯从卧室出来，用毛巾擦着他湿漉漉的头发。

en: He won a head-to-head battle with NF leader Jean-Marie Le Pen.
cn: 他在和国民阵线领袖让-马里·勒庞的正面交锋中获得了胜利。

en: Miserable, and unexpectedly lonely, she went in search of Jean-Paul.
cn: 内心痛苦、突感寂寞的她去寻找琼－保罗。

en: Jean-Phillippe had hitched all over Europe in the 1960s.
cn: 让－菲利普在20世纪60年代曾搭便车游遍欧洲。

en: Jerry is an amateur who dances because he feels like it.
cn: 杰里是个业余跳舞爱好者，他跳舞是因为自己喜欢。

en: Today I will do what others won't, so tomorrow I can accomplish what others can't.--Jerry Rice
cn: 今天我做了别人不愿做的事，明天我就能做到别人所不能做的事。

en: The place is a bit jerry-built.
cn: 这地方建造得有些不牢靠。

en: It is important that we put Jesus into the context of history.
cn: 我们将耶稣置于历史环境中来看是很重要的。

en: Pilate ordered Jesus to be brought forth.
cn: 彼拉多命令把耶稣带上来。

en: "But Jesus is here!" the priest intoned.
cn: “但是耶稣在这里！”牧师吟诵道。

en: Jim Coulters will mind the store while I'm away.
cn: 我不在的时候吉姆·库尔特斯会照看店铺的。

en: Jim expects to be sent to Europe any day now.
cn: 吉姆预计随时会被派到欧洲去。

en: She nestled the eggs safely in the straw in Jim's basket.
cn: 她把鸡蛋轻轻地放在吉姆篮子里的稻草上。

en: In the end I just couldn't kick Jimmy when he was down.
cn: 最后我就是无法做到在吉米倒霉时落井下石。

en: Middlesbrough's Jimmy Phillips was sent off for fouling Steve Tilson.
cn: 米德尔斯堡队的吉米·菲利普斯因为对史蒂夫·蒂尔森犯规而被罚下场。

en: Jimmy is adopted and thus unrelated to Beth by blood.
cn: 吉米是被收养的，因此和贝丝没有血缘关系。

en: He was hand-picked for this job by the Admiral.
cn: 他是由海军上将精心挑选出来担任这项工作的。

en: He was fired from his job after roughing up a colleague.
cn: 他因为对一位同事动粗而被开除了。

en: The public never had faith in his ability to handle the job.
cn: 公众从来不相信他有能力胜任这一职位。

en: You've done a fine job with Billy and Joey.
cn: 你和比利、乔伊一起干得非常出色。

en: The track features Joey Langton on percussion .
cn: 唱片的这段乐曲是乔伊∙兰顿演奏的打击乐。

en: "Look," he said in a confidential tone, "I want you to know that me and Joey are cops."
cn: “听着，”他悄声说，“我想让你知道我和乔伊是警察。”

en: We gave the gate money to the St John Ambulance brigade.
cn: 我们将门票收入都捐给了圣约翰急救队。

en: John, I'm sorry for Steve, but I think you'vemade the right decisions.
cn: 约翰，我为史蒂夫感到难过，但是我想你的决定是正确的。

en: Sue and John were especially thrilled with this award.
cn: 休和约翰对于获得这个奖项感到兴奋不已。

en: Johnny has changed his image to fit the times.
cn: 约翰尼已经改变了他的形象以迎合时代潮流。

en: Johnny and Guy are the greatest unacknowledged pop songwriters in Britain.
cn: 约翰尼和盖伊是英国最了不起的、还未被公众认可的流行歌曲创作者。

en: Johnny was the most persistent and most harmless of her admirers.
cn: 约翰尼是追她的人中最痴心、最没有心机的一个。

en: I know you will join me in wishing them Godspeed.
cn: 我知道你会同我一起祝愿他们诸事顺遂的。

en: Organisers expect up to 300,000 protesters to join the march.
cn: 组织者们预计会有多达30万名的抗议者参加这次游行。

en: Angela says she longs to join an amateur dramatics class.
cn: 安杰拉说她渴望参加业余戏剧班。

en: His friends say he was always quick to tell a joke.
cn: 他的朋友们说，以前他讲笑话总是张嘴就来。

en: He carried on telling a joke, laughing his head off.
cn: 他继续讲笑话，自己笑得前仰后合。

en: Chinese waiters stood in a cluster, sharing a private joke.
cn: 华人服务生们站在一起，讲着只有他们自己才懂的笑话。

en: His team-mates opened hotel windows, shouting "Jump!" and somewhat less printable banter.
cn: 他的队友打开了酒店的窗户，大叫着“跳！”，还开了一些上不了台面的玩笑。

en: The idea is to get the jump on him.
cn: 想法是要胜过他。

en: He was huddled with John trying to jump-start his car.
cn: 他和约翰凑在一起，试着用跨接引线发动他的汽车。

en: If you're not satisfied with the life you're living, don't just complain. Do something about it.
cn: 对于现况的不满，不能只是抱怨，要有作出改变。

en: It was just then that I chanced to look round.
cn: 就在那时，我恰好环顾了下四周。

en: I don't see the point in it really. It's just stupid.
cn: 我真的不理解这到底有什么意义，简直是愚蠢透顶。

en: Remember, keep a positive attitude and good things will happen.
cn: 记住：保持乐观的心态，好事自然会发生。

en: Llewelyn was mounting the stairs up into the keep.
cn: 卢埃林登上台阶，走进城堡主楼。

en: When you are sitting, keep your elbow on the arm rest.
cn: 坐立时，把胳膊肘靠在扶手上。

en: A skeleton staff of 20 is being kept on.
cn: 留下了20名骨干人员。

en: The plane has been kept in service far longer than originally intended.
cn: 这架飞机已经超期服役很长时间了。

en: He kept encouraging Rosie to find a place of her own.
cn: 他不断鼓励罗茜为自己找个住处。

en: The key issue was whether the four defendants acted dishonestly.
cn: 关键问题是4名被告是否存在欺诈行为。

en: For a beach resort with a difference, try Key West.
cn: 如果想去一个与众不同的海滨度假胜地，那就去基韦斯特吧。

en: He unlocked her door and handed her back the key.
cn: 他给她打开门锁，并把钥匙交还给她。

en: Dave pulled a back muscle and could barely kick the ball.
cn: 戴夫背部拉伤，几乎没法踢球。

en: I went to kick the ball and I completely missed it.
cn: 我去踢球却踢了个空。

en: In the end I just couldn't kick Jimmy when he was down.
cn: 最后我就是无法做到在吉米倒霉时落井下石。

en: He told us to get stuffed so we leaned on his kid.
cn: 他叫我们滚蛋，于是我们威胁他的孩子。

en: He beat up on my brother's kid one time.
cn: 他有一次殴打了我哥的孩子。

en: He's like some dreamy kid playing on his own.
cn: 他就像是个自娱自乐的爱幻想的孩子。

en: Don't try and double-cross me, Taylor, because I'll kill you.
cn: 别跟我耍花招，泰勒，要不我会杀了你。

en: They rob us, they infringe our rights, they kill us.
cn: 他们劫掠我们，侵犯我们的权利，对我们实施杀戮。

en: His objective was to kill the space station project altogether.
cn: 他的目的是使空间站项目全面停止。

en: The vital clue to the killer's identity was his nickname, Peanuts.
cn: 查明杀手身份的重要线索是他的外号叫“花生”.

en: So if it's not there now, the killer has it. Right?
cn: 如果它现在不在那里，就在凶手那里。是吧？

en: Police believe the killer punched her to death with his bare hands.
cn: 警方认为她是被凶手活活用拳头打死的。

en: War turns morality inside out: killing and cruelty are virtues.
cn: 战争颠倒是非：杀戮与残忍成了美德。

en: There is tension in the region following the killing of seven civilians.
cn: 随着7名平民被杀害，该地区局势紧张起来。

en: The national tragedy of rival groups killing each other continued throughout 1990.
cn: 敌对派别相互残杀的国家悲剧1990年全年都在上演。

en: There is good news of a kind for the Prime Minister.
cn: 对总理来说也算是有个好消息。

en: The army was ideologically opposed to the kind of economic solution proposed.
cn: 军方从意识形态角度出发反对所提议的经济方案。

en: I don't know why he bothers me with this kind of rubbish.
cn: 我不明白他为何用这种烂事来烦我。

en: The King made major concessions to end the confrontation with his people.
cn: 为了结束与其臣民的冲突，国王作出了很大的让步。

en: The king's indulgence towards his sons angered the business community.
cn: 国王对儿子们的纵容令商界恼火。

en: It is my destiny one day to be king.
cn: 我命中注定有一天要成为国王。

en: She planted a kiss on each of his leathery cheeks.
cn: 她在他粗糙的面颊上左右各吻了一下。

en: She tilted her face to kiss me quickly on the chin.
cn: 她侧过脸飞快地在我下巴上亲了一下。

en: I put my arms around her and gave her a kiss.
cn: 我抱着她吻了她一下。

en: The study links the main living area to the kitchen.
cn: 书房把主要的生活区与厨房连在一起。

en: They ate, as they usually did, in the kitchen.
cn: 像平常一样，他们是在厨房吃的饭。

en: There was a sound of loud voices from the kitchen.
cn: 厨房传来一阵喧闹声。

en: He knew what he wanted to do from the age of 14.
cn: 他14岁起就知道自己日后干什么了。

en: They had alienated the one man who knew the business.
cn: 他们弄僵了同那个唯一懂行的人之间的关系。

en: She laboured under the illusion that I knew what I was doing.
cn: 她有一个错觉，以为我知道自己在做什么。

en: Find Bernie and get him to knock an agreement together.
cn: 找到伯尼，让他尽快拟好一份协议。

en: They decided to knock the two rooms into one.
cn: 他们决定把两间屋子打通连成一间。

en: What they said was a real knock to my self-confidence.
cn: 他们的话是对我自信心的一次重大打击。

en: I know it's nothing serious and I feel quite unemotional about it.
cn: 我知道那根本没什么大不了的，所以有些无动于衷。

en: We all know that fats spoil by becoming rancid.
cn: 我们都知道油脂变质后会发臭。

en: Kaspar had spoken know-ledgeably about the state of agriculture in Europe.
cn: 卡斯帕对欧洲农业状况发表了一番颇有见地的见解。

en: He is known for his political savvy and strong management skills.
cn: 他以睿智的政治头脑和强势的管理手腕出名。

en: The man was known to the police because of previous convictions.
cn: 因为有犯罪前科，警察们都认识这个人。

en: Our school had a mascot known as Freddy Bird.
cn: 我们学校有一个名叫“弗雷迪小鸟”的吉祥物。

en: I wouldn't trust them in spite of all their la-di-da manners.
cn: 尽管他们处处显得很高雅的样子，我还是不相信他们。

en: La Noblesse restaurant has much to recommend it.
cn: “贵族”餐馆有很多值得称道之处。

en: They rerouted the planes at La Guardia airport.
cn: 他们改变了拉瓜迪亚机场飞机的航线。

en: Jovial ladies chivvy you into ordering more than you can eat!
cn: 热情的女招待会一再推荐，最后点的餐多到吃不下!

en: In 1854, Cheltenham Ladies' College became the first girls' public school.
cn: 1854年，切尔滕纳姆女子中学成为第一所女子公学。

en: He worked as a dancing partner for unescorted ladies at Manhattan cabarets.
cn: 他的工作是在曼哈顿的夜总会陪没有舞伴的女士跳舞。

en: Listen here, young lady. Don't you call me that!
cn: 你给我听着，小姐。别那样叫我！

en: In the past he dallied with actresses and lady novelists.
cn: 他过去曾与许多女演员和女小说家调情。

en: He bundled the old lady into her hallway and brutally attacked her.
cn: 他将老妇人推到她家走廊上，并对她一顿暴打。

en: The letter merely restated the law of the land.
cn: 这封信只不过重复了一下土地法。

en: Harry inherited the house and a sizeable chunk of land.
cn: 哈里继承了这座房子以及相当大的一片土地。

en: They used force to banish the natives from the more fertile land.
cn: 他们使用武力把土著居民驱逐出了比较肥沃的土地。

en: Friendship means understanding, not agreement. It means forgiveness, not forgetting.It means the memories last, even if contact is lost.
cn: 友情是理解，不是妥协；是原谅，不是遗忘。即使不联系，感情依然在。

en: She ran away with a man called McTavish last year.
cn: 去年，她和一个叫麦克塔维什的男人私奔了。

en: I picked first all the people who usually were left till last.
cn: 我先挑出了所有通常留到最后的人。

en: He defected from the party in the late 1970s.
cn: 他在20世纪70年代后期叛出了该党。

en: Stay in bed extra late or get up specially early.
cn: 起床过晚或过早。

en: Most late developers will catch up with their friends.
cn: 大多数身材发育迟缓者都会赶上他们的朋友。

en: At a later news conference, he said differences should not be dramatized.
cn: 在后来的新闻发布会上，他说不应夸大分歧。

en: I hate to rush you but I have another appointment later on.
cn: 我真不想催你，但我稍后还有一个约会。

en: I imagine they'll be tearing the building down sooner or later.
cn: 我猜他们早晚会拆除这座楼的。

en: For what do we live, but to make sport for our neighbours, and laugh at them in our turn?
cn: 我们活着是为了什么？不就是给邻居当笑柄，再反过来笑他们。

en: Do not hesitate to laugh at anything you find amusing.
cn: 只要觉得好笑就尽管笑。

en: He was falsely jovial, with his booming, mirthless laugh.
cn: 他低声苦笑了几声，装出快乐的样子。

en: I thought they were laughing at me because I was ugly.
cn: 我觉得他们嘲笑我是因为我长得丑。

en: He carried on telling a joke, laughing his head off.
cn: 他继续讲笑话，自己笑得前仰后合。

en: He was still laughing when he heard the rasp of Rennie's voice.
cn: 当他听到伦尼尖叫的声音时仍然在笑.

en: "He was a lawyer before that," Mary Ann put in.
cn: “在那之前他是个律师，”玛丽·安补充道。

en: The lawyer looked impassively at him and said nothing.
cn: 律师面无表情地看着他，什么都没说。

en: He could have made a fortune as a lawyer.
cn: 他本可以当律师挣大钱的。

en: On Sunday Cohen lay around the house all day.
cn: 科恩星期天一整天都在家无所事事。

en: Under the newspaper, atop a sheet of paper, lay an envelope.
cn: 在报纸下面的一张纸上放着一个信封。

en: Bob slid from his chair and lay prone on the floor.
cn: 鲍勃从椅子上滑下来，趴在了地板上。

en: Politicians say it could lead to a dissolution of parliament.
cn: 政客们说这可能会导致议会解散。

en: The group proceeded with a march they knew would lead to bloodshed.
cn: 这个团体继续示威游行，他们知道这将导致流血事件的发生。

en: This can lead to bodily weakness and muscle wastage.
cn: 这样可能会导致身体虚弱和肌肉萎缩。

en: No matter where you go in life or how old you get, there's always something new to learn about. After all, life is full of surprises.
cn: 不管你生活在哪里，你有多少岁，总有新东西要学习，毕竟，生活总是充满惊喜。

en: Eventually, you'll learn to cry that on the inside.
cn: 终有一天，你会学会让泪往心里流。

en: Did you learn anything in your day, as a student?
cn: 你在学生时代学到什么东西了吗？

en: She's kicked her drug habit and learned that her life has value.
cn: 她已经戒了毒，并且认识到了生命可贵。

en: I learned a lot from him about how to run a band.
cn: 我从他那里学到了许多关于经营乐队方面的东西.

en: She learned to draw by tracing pictures out of old storybooks.
cn: 她通过描摹旧故事书上的图画学会了画画。

en: Try to eat at least four slices of bread a day.
cn: 每天尽量至少吃4片面包。

en: He is the least appealing character, to me at any rate.
cn: 他是其中最没有吸引力的角色，至少对我来说是这样。

en: At least three British golf courses are now owned by the Japanese.
cn: 现在英国至少有3家高尔夫球场为日本人所有。

en: It got to the point where he had to leave.
cn: 到了他不得不走的地步。

en: One more question and I'll leave you in peace.
cn: 再问一个问题，我就不打扰你了。

en: I had to admire David's vow that he would leave the programme.
cn: 戴维发誓要离开这个项目，我不得不对他表示钦佩。

en: Adam stumbles on, leaving a trail of devastation in his wake.
cn: 亚当蹒跚而行，沿路留下毁坏的痕迹。

en: With characteristic impetuosity, he announced he was leaving school.
cn: 一贯性急冲动的他又宣布要退学了。

en: She'd made the right choice in leaving New York.
cn: 她离开纽约的决定是正确的。

en: As I sidestepped, the bottle hit me on the left hip.
cn: 我侧一步要躲闪的时候，瓶子打中了我的左髋部。

en: I picked first all the people who usually were left till last.
cn: 我先挑出了所有通常留到最后的人。

en: She dusted herself down and left to build her own career.
cn: 她重振旗鼓去开创自己的事业了。

en: He had to have one leg amputated above the knee.
cn: 他的一条腿不得不从膝部以上截断。

en: He heaved his crippled leg into an easier position.
cn: 他把自己的一条瘸腿抬到一个更加舒服的位置。

en: First he kicked the left leg, then he kicked the right.
cn: 他先踢左腿，然后踢右腿。

en: Does this dress make my legs look too stumpy?
cn: 这条裙子会使我的腿看上去又短又粗吗？

en: I stopped at the square and got out to stretch my legs.
cn: 我在广场处停下来，下车活动活动腿脚。

en: Legs of pork were cured and smoked over the fire.
cn: 在火上熏制猪腿。

en: These files have been zipped up to take up less disk space.
cn: 这些文档已经进行了压缩，以节省磁盘空间。

en: He is lined up for no less than four US television interviews.
cn: 多达4家美国电视媒体排期邀请他上节目接受采访。

en: Other amenities, less commonly available, include a library and exercise room.
cn: 还有一些不太常有的设施，包括图书馆和健身房。

en: Well, at any rate, let me thank you for all you did.
cn: 好吧，不管怎样，还是要感谢你所做的一切。

en: I let the horse drop his head to crop the spring grass.
cn: 我让马低下头啃吃春天的青草。

en: If they value these data, let them pay for them.
cn: 他们要是看重这些数据，就让他们出钱买。

en: The letter merely restated the law of the land.
cn: 这封信只不过重复了一下土地法。

en: The letter was short — a simple recitation of their problem.
cn: 信写得很短——只是简单地说了一下他们的问题。

en: The things that stuck out were his cockiness and his four-letter words.
cn: 与众不同之处在于他的骄傲自大和满嘴脏话。

en: The blame for the Charleston fiasco did not lie with him.
cn: 查尔斯顿惨败错不在他。

en: Lie face upwards with a cushion under your head.
cn: 头枕垫子仰卧。

en: The ship would lie there mirrored in a perfectly unmoving glossy sea.
cn: 船会停靠在那里，映衬在一片波澜不兴的湛蓝海水之中。

en: I'm a novice at these things, Lieutenant. You're the professional.
cn: 中尉，做这些事情我是新手，你是行家。

en: Fusilier Jones ran towards the Ops Room to find his lieutenant.
cn: 燧发枪团士兵琼斯奔向作战指挥室寻找他的中尉长官。

en: As a second lieutenant, he had to salute damned near everybody.
cn: 身为少尉，他几乎是逢人便得敬礼。

en: No matter where you go in life or how old you get, there's always something new to learn about. After all, life is full of surprises.
cn: 不管你生活在哪里，你有多少岁，总有新东西要学习，毕竟，生活总是充满惊喜。

en: If you love life, life will love you back.
cn: 热爱生活，生活也会厚爱你。(Arthur Rubinstein)

en: The happiest are not those who own all the best things, but those who can appreciate the beauty of life.
cn: 最幸福的人们并不一定什么都是最好，只是他们懂得欣赏生活的美好。

en: The light went out, and the room was plunged into darkness.
cn: 灯熄了，屋里陷入一片漆黑。

en: The company manufactures a range of innovative light-weight cycles.
cn: 这家公司生产一系列的新型轻便自行车。

en: The builders have perched a light concrete dome on eight slender columns.
cn: 建筑工人在8根细柱上架起轻巧的混凝土穹顶。

en: I thought you might like to read the enclosed.
cn: 我想你或许想要读一下信封里的内容。

en: Three hundred million dollars will be nothing like enough.
cn: 3亿美元远远不够。

en: He did not like to be caught out on details.
cn: 他不喜欢在细节上被人抓住把柄。

en: Megamalls and fast food restaurants line the highway system.
cn: 公路系统沿线有大型商场和快餐店。

en: Their first car rolls off the production line on December 16.
cn: 他们的第一辆车于12月16日下线。

en: Elliott crossed the finish line just half a second behind his adversary.
cn: 埃利奥特跨过终点线时仅比对手落后半秒钟。

en: A list of items is repeatedly flashed up on the screen.
cn: 一个选项列表反复出现在屏幕上。

en: The duke was surprised by his wife's omission from the guest list.
cn: 公爵对他的夫人未在获邀宾客之列感到意外。

en: Every care has been taken in compiling this list.
cn: 汇编这份清单时考虑得很充分。

en: When I asked him to stop, he would not listen.
cn: 我叫他停下，可他不听。

en: Listen here, young lady. Don't you call me that!
cn: 你给我听着，小姐。别那样叫我！

en: Listen to criticism but don't be crushed by it.
cn: 听取批评意见，但不要被它击垮。

en: He sat listening to the tick of the grandfather clock.
cn: 他坐在那儿，听着落地式大摆钟嘀嗒作响。

en: While this conver-sation was going on, I was listening with earnest attention.
cn: 这场对话进行的时候，我聚精会神地听着。

en: Listening to the scratchy recording, I recognized Walt Whitman immediately.
cn: 听到沙哑的录音，我立刻知道那是沃尔特·惠特曼。

en: It's not about making the amazing saves. It's the little things and small things that made great gatekeepers great.
cn: 伟大的门将不是靠神奇的扑救成就，而是靠注重小事和细节成功。（Tim Howard美国国家队门将）

en: He could just about see the little man behind the counter.
cn: 他勉强能看到柜台后面的小个子男人。

en: "I wish I had a little brother," said Daphne wistfully.
cn: “我希望有个小弟弟。”达夫妮伤感地说。

en: For what do we live, but to make sport for our neighbours, and laugh at them in our turn?
cn: 我们活着是为了什么？不就是给邻居当笑柄，再反过来笑他们。

en: I will return, find you, love you, marry you and live without shame.
cn: 我会回去，找到你，爱你，娶你，活的光明正大。

en: I clearly empathize with the people who live in those neighborhoods.
cn: 我非常同情生活在那些地方的人们。

en: Lenin lives on in the minds and hearts of millions of people.
cn: 列宁永远活在亿万人民的心中。

en: That big high-rise above us is where Brian lives.
cn: 我们上面的那座摩天大楼就是布赖恩住的地方。

en: Like their children, parents are often defensive about their private lives.
cn: 就像子女一样，父母也常常很注重保护他们的私生活。

en: If you're not satisfied with the life you're living, don't just complain. Do something about it.
cn: 对于现况的不满，不能只是抱怨，要有作出改变。

en: I would imagine she's quite lonely living on her own.
cn: 我猜想她一个人过肯定很孤独。

en: I took the phone, and she went discreetly into the living room.
cn: 我拿起了电话，她知趣地进了客厅。

en: The road to peace will be long and drawn-out.
cn: 通往和平的道路将很漫长。

en: It was five long miles to the nearest pub.
cn: 离最近的酒吧有长长的5英里的路程。

en: His destination was Chobham Common, a long way from his Cotswold home.
cn: 他的目的地是乔伯姆公地，那里和他在科茨沃尔德的家离得很远。

en: If you build more plastics into cars, the car lasts longer.
cn: 如果汽车采用更多塑料元件，寿命会更长一些。

en: The plane has been kept in service far longer than originally intended.
cn: 这架飞机已经超期服役很长时间了。

en: I no longer have any objection to your going to see her.
cn: 我不会再因为你去见她而不高兴。

en: It was just then that I chanced to look round.
cn: 就在那时，我恰好环顾了下四周。

en: She had the look of someone deserted and betrayed.
cn: 她一副遭人遗弃和背叛的样子。

en: Does this dress make my legs look too stumpy?
cn: 这条裙子会使我的腿看上去又短又粗吗？

en: She studied him for the longest time, looking wryly amused.
cn: 她面带苦笑，盯着他看了很长时间。

en: He finished his conversation and stood up, looking straight at me.
cn: 他说完话站起来，直视着我。

en: Joseph watched a shady-looking bunch playing cards aboard a Mississippi steamer.
cn: 约瑟夫看到一群可疑的人在密西西比河的一艘轮船上打牌。

en: "Good lord, that's what he is: he's a policeman."
cn: “我的天哪，他原来是警察呀。”

en: A few days earlier he had received a telegram from Lord Lloyd.
cn: 几天前，他收到劳埃德勋爵发来的一封电报。

en: His nine-month sentence was overturned by Appeal Court judge Lord Justice Watkins.
cn: 上诉法院法官沃特金斯撤销了对他作出的9个月徒刑的判决。

en: Some battles you win, some battles you lose.
cn: 胜败乃兵家常事。

en: He appealed to his countrymen not to lose heart.
cn: 他呼吁自己的同胞不要丧失信心。

en: Torn muscles retract, and lose strength, structure, and tightness.
cn: 撕裂的肌肉会收缩，丧失原来的力量、结构和紧实度。

en: Friendship means understanding, not agreement. It means forgiveness, not forgetting.It means the memories last, even if contact is lost.
cn: 友情是理解，不是妥协；是原谅，不是遗忘。即使不联系，感情依然在。

en: He missed the catch and the match was lost.
cn: 他没有接住球，比赛输了。

en: He lost two stone in weight during his time there.
cn: 他在那儿的时候体重下降了2英石。

en: I got quite a lot of ribbing from my team-mates.
cn: 队友们经常开我的玩笑。

en: I get very nervous because I'm using a lot of expensive equipment.
cn: 因为正在使用很多昂贵的设备，所以我非常紧张。

en: Do you sweat a lot or flush a lot?
cn: 你常出汗或是脸上常发烫吗？

en: English has hurt me a thousand times, but I still regard it as my first love.
cn: 英语伤我千百遍，我待英语如初恋。

en: If you love life, life will love you back.
cn: 热爱生活，生活也会厚爱你。(Arthur Rubinstein)

en: I will return, find you, love you, marry you and live without shame.
cn: 我会回去，找到你，爱你，娶你，活的光明正大。

en: Sweden is lovely in summer— cold beyond belief in winter.
cn: 瑞典的夏天非常宜人——冬天却冷得让人难以置信。

en: It was just one of those lovely old English gardens.
cn: 那正是一个那种古老的英式花园，非常迷人。

en: "Such lovely clothes. I'd no idea Milan was so wonderful," she raved.
cn: “这些时装太漂亮了。我没想到米兰是如此的精彩，”她赞不绝口。

en: Solid low-level waste will be disposed of deep underground.
cn: 放射性水平低的固体废料将做地下深埋处理。

en: Doctor believed that his low sperm count was the problem.
cn: 医生认为他的精子数太低是问题所在。

en: With a low-pitched rumbling noise, the propeller began to rotate.
cn: 伴随着隆隆的低沉噪声，螺旋桨开始旋转起来。

en: Good luck is when an opportunity comes along and you're prepared for it.
cn: 好运就是当机会来临时，你早已做好了准备。

en: He does deserve some good luck after so much wretchedness.
cn: 经过这么多苦难之后，他应该行点好运了。

en: Wood has not had much luck in carving out a career.
cn: 伍德想干出点名堂来，可是总不能如愿。

en: Chantal was lucky to be able to salvage her career.
cn: 尚塔尔能保住她的事业算是走了运。

en: I'm lucky really as I never put on weight.
cn: 我很幸运，因为我的体重从来没有增加过。

en: We're lucky to have such a man in our midst.
cn: 在我们中间有这样一个人是我们的幸运。

en: I felt so self-conscious under Luke's mother's intense gaze.
cn: 在卢克母亲审视的目光下，我感到极不自在。

en: Luke answered by tightening his grip on her shoulder.
cn: 卢克的回应就是把她的肩头抓得更紧了。

en: Luke's mother stopped smiling and looked reproachfully at him.
cn: 卢克的妈妈收起了笑容，用责备的眼光看着他。

en: We tend to meet up for lunch once a week.
cn: 我们往往每周共进一次午餐。

en: Use your lunch hour to have a nap in your chair.
cn: 利用午饭时间坐在椅子上打个盹吧。

en: We had lunch the other day at our favorite restaurant.
cn: 前两天我们在最喜欢的餐馆吃了午饭。

en: The injured man was lying motionless on his back.
cn: 那名受伤的男子一动不动地仰面躺在那里。

en: She turned back to the Bible lying open in her lap.
cn: 她将注意力又转回到摊放在腿上的《圣经》。

en: He said statisticians gave them a bad rap by "lying with figures".
cn: 他说统计学家“用数据说谎”，败坏了他们的名声。

en: One of the wittiest exemplars of the technique was M. C. Escher.
cn: 最为巧妙地运用那种技巧的一个典型人物就是M.C.埃舍尔。

en: The address is 2025 M Street, Northwest, Washington, DC, 20036.
cn: 地址为华盛顿特区，西北区，M大街2025号，邮政编码20036。

en: At approxi-mately 11:30 p.m., Pollard finally gave his consent to the search.
cn: 大概晚上11点半的时候，波拉德最终同意进行搜查。

en: Ma was still at work when I got back.
cn: 我回来的时候，妈妈还没下班。

en: Mark watched him ma-levolently.
cn: 马克恶狠狠地盯着他。

en: Hey, Ma. It's the old man.
cn: 嗨，妈，是老爸。

en: Planes dropped bombs and raked the beach with machine gun fire.
cn: 飞机投下炸弹，并用机关枪扫射海滩。

en: Parents can programme the machine not to turn on at certain times.
cn: 父母可以设定这台机器的程序，使它在特定时间段无法开启。

en: The repairs to the Hafner machine were near to completion.
cn: 对哈夫纳机器的修理即将结束。

en: There are certain things he does that drive me mad.
cn: 他的某些举动让我很生气。

en: She's not as mad about sport as I am.
cn: 她不像我对体育那么痴迷。

en: You are mad, Isabel. You should be locked up.
cn: 你疯了，伊莎贝尔。应该把你关起来才是。

en: It's not about making the amazing saves. It's the little things and small things that made great gatekeepers great.
cn: 伟大的门将不是靠神奇的扑救成就，而是靠注重小事和细节成功。（Tim Howard美国国家队门将）

en: Her bed was crisply made, her clothes put away.
cn: 她的床收拾得很整洁，衣服也收起来了。

en: It presented in satirical terms points made in earnest by Catholic writers.
cn: 它用讽刺的语言呈现了天主教作家郑重其事表明的观点。

en: The seven major industrial countries will have their yearly meeting in London.
cn: 7个主要工业国家将在伦敦举行一年一度的会议。

en: He said the issue was not a major irritant.
cn: 他说那个问题不是什么大问题。

en: The rail strike is causing major disruptions at the country's ports.
cn: 铁路罢工使该国港口陷入了一片混乱。

en: For what do we live, but to make sport for our neighbours, and laugh at them in our turn?
cn: 我们活着是为了什么？不就是给邻居当笑柄，再反过来笑他们。

en: These large institutions make — and change—the rules to suit themselves.
cn: 这些大机构总是随意制定规定，而且说变就变。

en: Does this dress make my legs look too stumpy?
cn: 这条裙子会使我的腿看上去又短又粗吗？

en: It's not about making the amazing saves. It's the little things and small things that made great gatekeepers great.
cn: 伟大的门将不是靠神奇的扑救成就，而是靠注重小事和细节成功。（Tim Howard美国国家队门将）

en: Mark had for some time been making advances towards her.
cn: 马克追她已经有一段时间了。

en: When your children misbehave tell them without making them feel small.
cn: 孩子表现不佳时要让他们知道，但不能让他们自惭形秽。

en: Though Sybbis complained bitterly, Mama would not let up on her.
cn: 尽管西比斯大发牢骚，但妈妈不会放她一马。

en: Your mama and I are gonna miss you at Christmas.
cn: 我和你妈妈过圣诞节的时候会想念你的。

en: Mama met me at the station.
cn: 妈妈在车站接我。

en: She ran away with a man called McTavish last year.
cn: 去年，她和一个叫麦克塔维什的男人私奔了。

en: Nora was deflowered by a man who worked in a soda-water factory.
cn: 在汽水厂工作的一个男子夺去了诺拉的童贞。

en: He could just about see the little man behind the counter.
cn: 他勉强能看到柜台后面的小个子男人。

en: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, many are stronger at the broken places.
cn: 生活总是让我们遍体鳞伤，但到后来，那些受伤的地方会变得更坚强。

en: I recall many discussions with her on these and kindred topics.
cn: 我回想起多次同她就这些问题及类似话题进行的讨论。

en: She has had many credits and name-checks in American Vogue.
cn: 美国版《时尚》多次对她进行赞扬或是提到她的名字。

en: Mark had for some time been making advances towards her.
cn: 马克追她已经有一段时间了。

en: Mark was condemned to do most of the work.
cn: 马克被迫承担大部分工作。

en: Mark was out of earshot, walking ahead of them.
cn: 马克走在前面，听不见他们的声音。

en: After a three-weekend courtship, Pamela accepted Randolph's proposal of marriage.
cn: 经过3个周末的追求之后，帕梅拉接受了伦道夫的求婚。

en: After sixteen years of marriage they have grown bored with each other.
cn: 结婚16年后，他们已经渐渐彼此厌倦了。

en: Mr Olaechea has British residency by virtue of his marriage.
cn: 奥拉伊奇先生通过结婚而取得在英国的永久居留权。

en: The couple married in the Caribbean to avoid a media circus.
cn: 为了摆脱媒体的关注，这对新人在加勒比喜结连理。

en: They had met by chance at university and finished up getting married.
cn: 他们在大学偶遇，最后结了婚。

en: I lived there once myself, before I got married.
cn: 我结婚前曾独自在那儿住过。

en: I will return, find you, love you, marry you and live without shame.
cn: 我会回去，找到你，爱你，娶你，活的光明正大。

en: In many societies children still marry someone of their parents' choice.
cn: 在许多社会，子女结婚仍然只能听从父母之命。

en: I think he wanted to marry her, if I am not mistaken.
cn: 我觉得他曾经想娶她为妻，如果我没有弄错的话。

en: Queen Mary started the fashion for blue and white china in England.
cn: 玛丽女王开启了青花瓷在英格兰的流行风尚。

en: Mary Ann doesn't want to have children. Not right now, anyway.
cn: 玛丽·安不想要孩子，至少现在不想。

en: "He was a lawyer before that," Mary Ann put in.
cn: “在那之前他是个律师，”玛丽·安补充道。

en: I fell under the influence of a history master.
cn: 我当时深受一位历史老师的影响。

en: Jackson remained calm and always master of his passions.
cn: 杰克逊镇定自若，始终克制着情绪。

en: When his master's off traveling, Caleb stays with Pierre's parents.
cn: 凯莱布在主人外出旅行时与皮埃尔的父母住在一起。

en: No matter where you go in life or how old you get, there's always something new to learn about. After all, life is full of surprises.
cn: 不管你生活在哪里，你有多少岁，总有新东西要学习，毕竟，生活总是充满惊喜。

en: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.
cn: 努力过，失败过，没关系，屡战屡败，屡败屡战，每一次失败都比上一次更好。

en: "Steve, what do you want?" — "Coke, Pepsi, it doesn't matter."
cn: “史蒂夫，你要喝点什么？”——“可口可乐，百事，随便啦。”

en: They may headhunt her for the vacant position of Executive Producer.
cn: 他们可能会挖她去填补执行制片人这一空缺职位。

en: The agreement has raised hopes that the war may end soon.
cn: 那项协议使人们感到战争有望很快结束。

en: Sightseers may be a little overwhelmed by the crowds and noise.
cn: 拥挤的人群和喧闹的噪音可能会让游客有些茫然不知所措。

en: Maybe I eat too much and that's what makes me dozy.
cn: 也许我吃得太多了，所以昏昏欲睡。

en: The men were maybe a hundred feet away and coming closer.
cn: 那些人大约有100英尺远，正在向这里靠近。

en: Maybe this guy isn't so squeaky clean after all.
cn: 也许这个人说到底品行并非那么完美。

en: English has hurt me a thousand times, but I still regard it as my first love.
cn: 英语伤我千百遍，我待英语如初恋。

en: He finished his conversation and stood up, looking straight at me.
cn: 他说完话站起来，直视着我。

en: Well, at any rate, let me thank you for all you did.
cn: 好吧，不管怎样，还是要感谢你所做的一切。

en: "What do you mean?" I asked, offended on Liddie's behalf.
cn: “你什么意思啊？”我问，替利迪感到愤愤不平。

en: This will mean more remand prisoners being held in police cells.
cn: 这将意味着更多候审犯人会被拘押在警局拘留室。

en: Take a hundred and twenty values and calculate the mean.
cn: 取120个值计算平均数。

en: Friendship means understanding, not agreement. It means forgiveness, not forgetting.It means the memories last, even if contact is lost.
cn: 友情是理解，不是妥协；是原谅，不是遗忘。即使不联系，感情依然在。

en: A special locking system means the door cannot be opened accidentally.
cn: 特殊的锁定系统使门不会被意外打开。

en: This proposal is by no means a sure thing.
cn: 这个提议绝不会理所当然地获得通过。

en: Its new title was meant to give the party greater public appeal.
cn: 新的党名意在使该党对公众具有更强的吸引力。

en: I can't say any more, it's meant to be a big secret.
cn: 我再也无可奉告了，这本是重大的秘密。

en: Asked what she meant, she said mysteriously: "Work it out for yourself".
cn: 问她是什么意思，她故弄玄虚地说：“你自己想吧。”

en: We tend to meet up for lunch once a week.
cn: 我们往往每周共进一次午餐。

en: The three parties will meet next month to work out remaining differences.
cn: 三方将在下个月会面，以解决余下的分歧。

en: Many of Britain's beaches fail to meet minimum standards of cleanliness.
cn: 英国许多海滩连最起码的卫生标准都达不倒。

en: We'll go to a meeting in Birmingham and come straight back.
cn: 我们将去伯明翰参加会议，然后马上回来。

en: The Politburo has been meeting in Peking to discuss the situation.
cn: 政治局已在北京召开会议讨论形势。

en: The club has moved its meeting to Saturday, January 22nd.
cn: 俱乐部把会议日期改到1月22号，星期六。

en: The commander and some of the men had been released.
cn: 指挥官和一些士兵已经获释。

en: 13 men have been questioned in connection with the murder.
cn: 有13名男子因谋杀案受到盘问。

en: It would be difficult to find two men who were more dissimilar.
cn: 很难找到彼此间差异更大的人了。

en: His immediate superior has singled him out for a special mention.
cn: 他的顶头上司特别提到了他。

en: I believe he was concerned in all those matters you mention.
cn: 我认为你提到的那些事都与他有关。

en: The mere mention of John had touched a very raw nerve indeed.
cn: 提到约翰就真的让人心痛。

en: England's European Championship plans are in a right mess.
cn: 英格兰队的欧洲锦标赛作战计划乱七八糟。

en: A waiter mopped up the mess as best he could.
cn: 一名侍者尽力抹掉溅出的食物。

en: Except for the remarkably tidy kitchen, the place was a mess.
cn: 除了厨房特别干净外，这地方一片狼藉。

en: The delegation was carrying a message of thanks to President Mubarak.
cn: 代表团向穆巴拉克总统转达了谢意。

en: I got a message you were trying to reach me.
cn: 我收到一条留言，说你想跟我联系。

en: Stationery can be imprinted with your message or logo.
cn: 可以把你的信息或标志印在信纸上。

en: The unevenly matched armies met at Guilford on 15 March 1781.
cn: 1781年3月15日，力量悬殊的两支队伍在吉尔福德狭路相逢。

en: They had met by chance at university and finished up getting married.
cn: 他们在大学偶遇，最后结了婚。

en: She met Mr and Mrs Ricciardi, who were very nice to her.
cn: 她见到了里恰尔迪夫妇，他们对她非常友好。

en: She knelt and brushed her lips softly across Michael's cheek.
cn: 她跪了下来，轻吻迈克尔的脸颊。

en: Michael Fish is my favourite. He's a hoot, a real character.
cn: 我最喜欢迈克尔·菲什。他滑稽逗趣，是个实实在在的人物。

en: Michael gave him a dirty look and walked out.
cn: 迈克尔狠狠地瞪了他一眼然后走开了。

en: Middle East peace talks in Washington showed signs of progress yesterday.
cn: 昨天在华盛顿举行的中东和谈有了取得进展的迹象。

en: Babearth regarded the middle classes as the betrayers of the Revolution.
cn: 巴博施把中产阶级看作是革命的叛徒。

en: She was born in the middle of a rain storm.
cn: 她出生在一场暴风雨中。

en: I thought you might like to read the enclosed.
cn: 我想你或许想要读一下信封里的内容。

en: I might today hesitate to turn in a burglar.
cn: 现在让我把入室窃贼送交警方，我可能会有所顾虑。

en: Things might have been different if I'd talked a bit more.
cn: 如果当时我再多说一点的话，结果或许会不一样。

en: Mike kept snatching him up by the collar and jerking him up.
cn: 迈克一直揪着他的领子把他往上猛举。

en: She strove mightily to put Mike from her thoughts.
cn: 她拼命想忘却迈克。

en: In therapy, she began to let go of her obsession with Mike.
cn: 在心理治疗中，她开始逐渐放下对麦克的痴迷。

en: Three hundred million dollars will be nothing like enough.
cn: 3亿美元远远不够。

en: Albania is a small nation state of around 3 million people.
cn: 阿尔巴尼亚是一个大约有300万人口的单一民族独立国家。

en: The disease wiped out 40 million rabbits at a stroke.
cn: 该疾病一下子就使4,000万只兔子丧命。

en: The opportunity had gone. His mind scrabbled for alternatives.
cn: 机会已经失去。他苦苦思索别的方案。

en: Jim Coulters will mind the store while I'm away.
cn: 我不在的时候吉姆·库尔特斯会照看店铺的。

en: How very thoughtless. I'll give him a piece of my mind.
cn: 真是太没头脑了，我要告诉他我很生气。

en: I shall have words with these stupid friends of mine!
cn: 我真应该跟我这些愚蠢的朋友理论理论！

en: She tells me her troubles. I tell her mine.
cn: 我和她互相倾诉烦恼。

en: A gold mine is not a bottomless pit, the gold runs out.
cn: 金矿并非无底的宝藏，金子终究会被采光。

en: The Liberal Democrat'ssupport fell away at the last minute.
cn: 自由民主党的支持率在最后一刻有所下降。

en: The minute that the war started, everybody was glued to the television.
cn: 战事一起，所有人都盯紧了电视报道。

en: He'd telephoned with some phoney excuse she didn't believe for a minute.
cn: 他找了某个她根本不会相信的借口给她打电话。

en: At Miss Garbo's request there was a crema-tion after a private ceremony.
cn: 应嘉宝小姐的要求，在私人悼念仪式结束后将进行火葬。

en: She looked at Miss Melville, snugly ensconced among her new friends.
cn: 她看了看梅尔维尔小姐，她正舒适地安坐在新朋友中间。

en: It would be just his luck to miss the last boat.
cn: 他就这运气，误了最后一班船也毫不出奇。

en: Ah yes, but think of all the family life they're missing.
cn: 是这样，不过别忘了他们错过了多少天伦之乐。

en: She was very glum and was obviously missing her children.
cn: 她郁郁寡欢，显然在惦念自己的孩子们。

en: It is not unknown for valuable display items to go, ahem, missing.
cn: 贵重的展品，呃哼，丢失的话，会众人皆知。

en: Riyadh got 25 mm of rain in just 12 hours.
cn: 利雅得在12小时内降水就达25毫米。

en: "I think the earlier ones are a lot better." —"Mm, definitely."
cn: “我觉得早前的那些要好得多。”——“嗯，毫无疑问。”

en: "Mm," she answered drowsily.
cn: “嗯，”她困恹恹地回答道。

en: "Was she good?"— 'Mmm. Up to a point.'
cn: “她行不行？”——“嗯，某种程度上来说还可以。”

en: Mmm! What's cooking? It'smells delicious.
cn: 炒什么菜 啊 ?好香呀!

en: Tony sipped from his glass. "Mmm. Ambrosia. Nectar of the gods. Divine. Wonderful."
cn: 托尼从杯中抿了一口感叹道：“哇，人间美味啊，神灵的琼浆玉液呀，天赐之物，太棒了。”

en: I'll report back the moment I have located him.
cn: 我一找到他就马上汇报。

en: He's touring South America at this moment in time.
cn: 他此刻正在南美旅游观光。

en: Gail was silent for a moment, regarding Harry with his steady gaze.
cn: 盖尔镇定地注视着哈里，沉默了片刻。

en: Mommy, you don't need to stay while we talk.
cn: 妈妈,我们谈话时你不必陪着.

en: When Mommy comes, just tell her I'm up here.
cn: 妈妈来了就告诉她我在这上面。

en: Mommy and I went in an aeroplane.
cn: 我和妈妈登上一架飞机。

en: I spent lots of money on smart new outfits for work.
cn: 我花大笔钱购置了上班时穿的漂亮新套装。

en: She'd do anything for a bit of pin money.
cn: 为了挣点外快，她什么都肯做。

en: Many of the leaders have become hooked on power and money.
cn: 很多领导人都变得贪恋权力和金钱。

en: One month before the deadline we see the hollowness of these promises.
cn: 离最后期限只有一个月时，我们认识到了这些许诺都是空头支票。

en: The three parties will meet next month to work out remaining differences.
cn: 三方将在下个月会面，以解决余下的分歧。

en: He won last month's presidential election by a landslide.
cn: 他以压倒性多数赢得上月的总统选举。

en: I don't want any more of that heavy stuff.
cn: 我再也不想碰那种麻烦事了。

en: Things might have been different if I'd talked a bit more.
cn: 如果当时我再多说一点的话，结果或许会不一样。

en: If you build more plastics into cars, the car lasts longer.
cn: 如果汽车采用更多塑料元件，寿命会更长一些。

en: A Delta II rocket was launched from Cape Canaveral early this morning.
cn: 今天一早，一枚“德尔塔”Ⅱ型火箭在卡纳维拉尔角发射升空。

en: They're freshly baked. I fetched them from the baker's this morning.
cn: 它们是刚出炉的。我早上去面包房买回来的。

en: The weather was unkind to those pipers who played in the morning.
cn: 坏天气对上午那些风笛吹奏者毫不容情。

en: The most pleasurable experience of the evening was the wonderful fireworks display.
cn: 这个晚上最让人高兴的就是精彩的焰火表演。

en: Early American weathervanes were most often cut from flat wooden boards.
cn: 美国早期的风向标大多截自平直的木板。

en: Most of the wine was unfit for human consumption.
cn: 这些酒中大部分都不适于人类饮用。

en: Mrs Allen's style of cooking owes much to her mother-in-law.
cn: 艾伦太太的烹饪风格很大程度上承传于她的婆婆。

en: Did she usurp his place in his mother's heart?
cn: 她取代了他在他母亲心目中的地位吗？

en: The desire to be a mother may creep up on you unexpectedly.
cn: 你会不知不觉地产生想当母亲的渴望。

en: A thorough brushing helps to freshen up your mouth.
cn: 彻底刷牙有助于口气清新。

en: His mouth was a little open, as if he'd started to scream.
cn: 他的嘴微微张开,似乎是要开始尖叫.

en: I've always had a loud mouth, I refuse to be silenced.
cn: 我一贯大声说出自己的想法，不会迫于压力而一言不发。

en: So, if we could just move onto something else?
cn: 那么我们可不可以干脆谈点别的？

en: They are selling their house to move to a smaller one.
cn: 他们正打算卖掉房子，然后搬到一个小一点的住处。

en: If the company was to relocate, most employees would move.
cn: 如果这个公司要搬迁，多数员工也要搬家。

en: The movie sees Burton psychoanalysing Firth to cure him of his depression.
cn: 在电影中伯顿对弗思进行了精神分析，想要治愈他的抑郁症。

en: This could be the feel-good movie of the autumn.
cn: 这可以称得上是今秋令人赏心悦目的影片了。

en: If you're a Billy Crystal fan, you'lllove this movie.

en: She probably sensed that I wasn'ttelling her the whole story.
cn: 她可能意识到了我并没有对她全盘托出。

en: Swimming is probably the best form of exercise you can get.
cn: 游泳或许是现有的最佳锻炼方式。

en: If there was any disappointment it was probably temporary.
cn: 即便有点儿失望，也肯定是暂时的。

en: The plan is good; the problem is it doesn't go far enough.
cn: 计划不错；问题在于不够深入。

en: I pushed the problem aside; at present it was insoluble.
cn: 我把问题抛在一边，目前它还无法解决。

en: The letter was short — a simple recitation of their problem.
cn: 信写得很短——只是简单地说了一下他们的问题。

en: Professor Baker is unacquainted with the idea of representative democracy.
cn: 贝克教授并不熟悉“代议制民主”这一思想。

en: The Professor said that deep sleep allowed suppressed anxieties to surface.
cn: 教授说深度睡眠可以使压抑的焦虑情绪得以释放。

en: Professor Griffiths explained how the drug appears to work.
cn: 格里菲思教授解释了那种药物的工作原理。

en: The boy first showed promise as an athlete in grade school.
cn: 这个男孩在上小学的时候就初次显示出成为运动员的潜力。

en: I'm hoping you'll keep your promise to come for a long visit.
cn: 我希望你遵守诺言来这儿多呆几天。

en: President Kaunda fulfilled his promise of announcing a date for the referendum.
cn: 卡翁达总统兑现了他的承诺，宣布了全民公决的日期。

en: Such laws could protect the consumer from harmful or dangerous remedies.
cn: 这样的法规可以保护消费者免受有害或者危险药品的威胁。

en: Namibian law permits ranchers to shoot cheetahs to protect their livestock.
cn: 纳米比亚法律允许农场主射杀猎豹以保护家畜。

en: Many manufacturers have policies to protect themselves against blackmailers.
cn: 许多厂家都购买了保险，以防遭到敲诈。

en: Derek is now the proud father of a bouncing baby girl.
cn: 德里克现在为有一个健康活泼的女宝宝而骄傲。

en: She noticed her own proud walk had become a shuffle.
cn: 她意识到自己趾高气扬的步伐已变成了拖着脚走路了。

en: The handles stand proud of the doors of the car.
cn: 把手位于车门之外。

en: I have to prove myself as a respectable, balanced, person.
cn: 我必须证明自己是个正派、稳重的人。

en: If they prove ineffective they should be demoted or asked to retire.
cn: 如果事实证明他们已无力胜任，应该将他们降级或让他们退休。

en: There is the strong possibility that such cooperation will prove unworkable.
cn: 这种合作很有可能会行不通。

en: The public never had faith in his ability to handle the job.
cn: 公众从来不相信他有能力胜任这一职位。

en: There needs to be a properly informed public debate.
cn: 有必要让公众在充分知情的状况下展开辩论。

en: He was headmaster of a public school in the West of England.
cn: 他是英格兰西部一所公学的校长。

en: The pull-out of the army paves the way for independence.
cn: 军队的撤出为独立铺平了道路。

en: I only pull in 15,000 a year as a social worker.
cn: 作为一名社工，我每年仅挣15,000。

en: Suddenly all the men pull out pistols and begin blasting away.
cn: 突然，所有人都拔出手枪，连续射击。

en: I saw her push the boulder down on you.
cn: 我看见她将巨石推下砸向你。

en: Information is called up at the push of a button.
cn: 按一个键信息就会被调出来。

en: The new Chancellor has the guts to push through unpopular tax increases.
cn: 新总理有勇气推动不受欢迎的增税方案获得通过。

en: A changing world has put pressures on the corporation.
cn: 日新月异的世界使这家公司感到了压力。

en: Barry had his nose put out of joint by Lucy's aloof sophistication.
cn: 露西的冷淡与世故使得巴里十分不快。

en: Her bed was crisply made, her clothes put away.
cn: 她的床收拾得很整洁，衣服也收起来了。

en: This brings us to the second question I asked.
cn: 这就将我们带到了我所提的第二个问题。

en: People want to dissect his work and question his motives.
cn: 人们想仔细分析他的作品，并对他的动机提出质疑。

en: One more question and I'll leave you in peace.
cn: 再问一个问题，我就不打扰你了。

en: Don't worry. We'll have you out of here double-quick.
cn: 别担心，我们会很快把你从这儿弄出去的。

en: This delicious variation on an omelette is quick and easy to prepare.
cn: 这种稍加变化的可口煎蛋卷做起来又快又容易。

en: I looked at what he'd given me and did a quick subtraction.
cn: 我看着他给我的东西，快速做了个减法。

en: He skimmed the pages quickly, then read them again more carefully.
cn: 他先快速地浏览页面，然后再细细阅读。

en: The White House quickly announced that the policy is under review.
cn: 白宫很快宣布该项政策正在审核中。

en: She reloaded the gun as quickly as she could.
cn: 她以最快的速度再次给枪装上子弹。

en: The room was quiet; no one volunteered any further information.
cn: 房间很安静，无人主动提供更多的信息。

en: Jeremy wants some peace and quiet before his big match.
cn: 杰里米希望在大赛来临之前能享受到些许平静和安宁。

en: The wine towns encountered are, on the whole, quiet and modest.
cn: 所到的酒镇总的来说都是宁静祥和的。

en: Well, parenthetically, I was trying to quit smoking at the time.
cn: 嗯，插一句，我那时正在努力戒烟。

en: He quit his job as an office boy in Athens.
cn: 他辞去了在雅典当办公室勤杂工的工作。

en: He did not quit as France's prime minister of his own accord.
cn: 他辞去法国总理职务并非出于自愿。

en: Failure is never quite so frightening as regret.
cn: 比失败更令人恐惧的是懊悔。

en: I know it's nothing serious and I feel quite unemotional about it.
cn: 我知道那根本没什么大不了的，所以有些无动于衷。

en: I would imagine she's quite lonely living on her own.
cn: 我猜想她一个人过肯定很孤独。

en: Before the race, he is fine. But afterwards he is worn out.
cn: 赛前他状态很好，赛后就筋疲力尽了。

en: Duke was soundly defeated in this month's Louisiana governor's race.
cn: 杜克在本月的路易斯安那州长竞选中大败而归。

en: Few jockeys continue race-riding beyond the age of 40.
cn: 很少有职业赛马骑师超过40岁仍继续参加赛马的。

en: She ran away with a man called McTavish last year.
cn: 去年，她和一个叫麦克塔维什的男人私奔了。

en: Teddy ran thick fingers through his unruly thatch of hair.
cn: 特迪用自己的粗手指头捋了一下浓密蓬乱的头发。

en: He ran a newspaper stand outside the American Express office.
cn: 他在美国运通公司办公大楼外经营一家报摊。

en: Rather taken aback by such forwardness, I slammed down the phone.
cn: 如此无礼的言语让我火冒三丈，我砰的一下把电话挂了。

en: The process is not a circle but rather a spiral.
cn: 这个过程不是一个圆周运动而是螺旋上升型的。

en: I gradually got rather disillusioned with the whole setup of the university.
cn: 渐渐地，我对大学的整个体制感到相当失望。

en: Ray was very giggly and joking all the time.
cn: 蕾特别喜欢咯咯地笑，而且总是爱开玩笑。

en: Ray and I ate our meal and reminisced about the trip.
cn: 雷和我吃着饭，回忆起那次旅行。

en: Ray will earn his keep on local farms while studying.
cn: 雷求学期间会在当地的农场干活赚取生活费。

en: If you're not satisfied with the life you're living, don't just complain. Do something about it.
cn: 对于现况的不满，不能只是抱怨，要有作出改变。

en: Good luck is when an opportunity comes along and you're prepared for it.
cn: 好运就是当机会来临时，你早已做好了准备。

en: The ballot was re-run on Mr Todd's insistence after accusations of malpractice.
cn: 因被控舞弊，在托德先生的坚持下重新进行了投票。

en: I thought you might like to read the enclosed.
cn: 我想你或许想要读一下信封里的内容。

en: In her spare time she read books on cooking.
cn: 业余时间里她看一些烹饪方面的书籍。

en: When the decision was read out Mrs Gardner thanked the judges.
cn: 判决书宣读完，加德纳夫人向法官们表示感谢。

en: His remedial teacher sees signs of progress in his reading and writing.
cn: 他的辅导教师发现了他在阅读和写作方面进步的迹象。

en: They will concentrate on teaching the basics of reading, writing and arithmetic.
cn: 他们将集中教授阅读、写作和算术基础知识。

en: Hopefully, you won't have any problems after reading this.
cn: 希望你读完这个后就不会有任何问题了。

en: Fraud squad officers had bugged the phone and were ready to pounce.
cn: 反诈骗小组的警员们已在电话上安装了窃听器，并随时准备突击。

en: Tamsin materialized at her side, notebook at the ready.
cn: 塔姆辛从她身旁冒了出来，且备好了笔记本。

en: Catherine was ready to explode. "I think you're contemptible!"
cn: 凯瑟琳气得快要炸了。“我觉得你真是可鄙！”

en: Michael Fish is my favourite. He's a hoot, a real character.
cn: 我最喜欢迈克尔·菲什。他滑稽逗趣，是个实实在在的人物。

en: What we need is not manifestos of pious intentions, but real action.
cn: 我们需要的不是善意但难以实现的宣言，而是实际行动。

en: A child may not differentiate between his imagination and the real world.
cn: 儿童可能无法将自己的幻想与真实世界区分开来。

en: I didn't realize how heavy that shopping was going to be.
cn: 我没想到买的东西会有多沉。

en: The Emperor must realize that he has us at his mercy.
cn: 皇帝必须意识到我们任由他处置。

en: I realize there's no consensus on what are male or female values.
cn: 我意识到人们对什么是男性价值观和什么是女性价值观并无共识。

en: I really don't see any reason for changing it.
cn: 我真的不明白为什么要改变它。

en: There's a reason why women don't read this stuff; it's not funny.
cn: 女人不读这种东西是有原因的，它并不好笑。

en: To an extent, that is the reason for the meeting.
cn: 在某种程度上，那就是召开这次会议的原因。

en: Exports in June rose 1.5% to a record $30.91 billion.
cn: 6月份的出口额上升了1.5%，创下309.1亿美元的历史最高纪录。

en: The water level in Lake Taihu has reached record levels.
cn: 太湖水位达到了历史最高值。

en: Australia's rugby union side enjoyed a record-breaking win over France.
cn: 澳大利亚的英式橄榄球联盟队创纪录地赢了法国队。

en: If your skin becomes red, sore or very scaly, consult your doctor.
cn: 如果皮肤发红、瘙痒或脱皮，要向医生咨询。

en: His exercise books were full of well deserved red ticks.
cn: 他的练习本上尽是些红钩钩，都是他应得的。

en: Bake some big red peppers and hollow them out.
cn: 将几个大红甜椒烤一烤，再把它们掏空。

en: A good relationship involves concern and sensitivity for each other's feelings.
cn: 一段美满的恋情需要彼此关心并体恤对方的情感。

en: She wouldn't want to be in a monogamous relationship.
cn: 她不想要单一性伴侣的关系。

en: Wanting fidelity implies you're thinking about a major relationship.
cn: 要求忠诚意味着你想发展一段严肃认真的恋爱关系。

en: Massage is used to relax muscles, relieve stress and improve the circulation.
cn: 按摩可以使肌肉放松，缓解压力和促进血液循环。

en: How much can the President relax his grip over the nation?
cn: 总统可以对国家的控制放松到什么样的程度？

en: Relax as much as possible and keep breathing steadily.
cn: 尽量放松，保持平稳呼吸。

en: Remember, keep a positive attitude and good things will happen.
cn: 记住：保持乐观的心态，好事自然会发生。

en: Remember, happiness doesn't depend upon who you are or what you have; it depends solely upon what you think.--Dale Carnegie
cn: 请记住，幸福不在于你是谁或者你拥有什么，而仅仅取决于你的心态！

en: I distinctly remember wishing I had not got involved.
cn: 我清楚地记得希望自己没有被牵扯进去。

en: I'll report back the moment I have located him.
cn: 我一找到他就马上汇报。

en: Many areas in the country'sinterior are unable to report Aids cases immediately.
cn: 该国内地的很多地区无法即时报告艾滋病病例。

en: Politicians want a lap-dog press which will uncritically report their propaganda.
cn: 政客们想要的是不问是非、甘为他们搞宣传的哈巴狗一样的新闻媒体。

en: The treaty binds them to respect their neighbour's independence.
cn: 条约规定他们必须尊重其邻国的独立。

en: We need to restore respect for the law-enforcement agencies.
cn: 我们需要重塑执法机构的声望。

en: I respect his judgement and I'll follow any advice he gives me.
cn: 我尊重他的判断能力，会接受他提出的任何建议。

en: The price of oil should remain stable for the rest of 1992.
cn: 油价会在1992年剩下的时间里保持稳定。

en: When you are sitting, keep your elbow on the arm rest.
cn: 坐立时，把胳膊肘靠在扶手上。

en: He wolfed down the rest of the biscuit and cheese.
cn: 他把剩下的饼干和奶酪一扫而光。

en: I will return, find you, love you, marry you and live without shame.
cn: 我会回去，找到你，爱你，娶你，活的光明正大。

en: Ellery's return will help to chase away some of the gloom.
cn: 埃勒里的归来可以驱散一些抑郁的情绪。

en: Return the enclosed Donation Form today in the prepaid envelope provided.
cn: 请于今日将随函附上的捐款表格用所提供的邮资预付的信封寄回。

en: He hoped to strike it rich by investing in ginseng.
cn: 他希望通过投资人参发大财。

en: We gained a rich supply of data which would normally be inaccessible.
cn: 我们得到了通常难以获取的大量数据。

en: Liver and kidney are particularly rich in vitamin A.
cn: 肝脏和肾脏的维生素A含量尤其丰富。

en: Richard Chamberlain has agreed to make a sequel to "The Thorn Birds".
cn: 理查德·张伯伦已经同意接拍《荆棘鸟》的续集。

en: Uncle Richard intoned a chapter from the Bible and improvised a prayer.
cn: 理查德叔叔吟诵了《圣经》中的一章，又即兴作了一段祈祷文。

en: Richard Dunwoody is in front in the jockeys' title race.
cn: 理查德·邓伍迪在职业赛马骑师冠军赛中领先其他选手。

en: The proposals are an attempt to rid the country of political corruption.
cn: 这些提议试图使这个国家摆脱政治腐败。

en: Why couldn't he ever rid himself of those thoughts, those worries?
cn: 为什么他总是无法摆脱那些想法和担忧？

en: You'll never quite get rid of every last bit of grit.
cn: 无法把所有的沙砾都清除干净。

en: If you want a cheap ride, take a minicab.
cn: 要想出行便宜，就坐小型出租车吧。

en: The ride was smooth until they got into the merchant ship's wake.
cn: 航行一直很顺利，直到他们碰上了商船的尾流。

en: Naomi was given a pony and taught to ride side-saddle.
cn: 别人给娜奥米一匹小型马并教会她如何侧骑马。

en: Instead of complaining about what's wrong, be grateful for what's right.
cn: 别抱怨不好的事，要对美好的事心存感恩。

en: You'll need to get on the right side of Carmela.
cn: 你得讨卡梅拉的欢心。

en: More people would be attracted to cycling if conditions were right.
cn: 如果天气适宜，会有更多的人被吸引到骑自行车的行列中来。

en: If you'd like more information, ring the Hotline on 414 3929.
cn: 如果想了解更多信息，请拨打热线电话4143929。

en: Friendship is much more important to me than a stupid old ring!
cn: 友谊对我来说可比一个破戒指重要得多！

en: Any minute now, that phone is going to ring.
cn: 那部电话随时可能响。

en: The river widens considerably as it begins to turn east.
cn: 河流转向东流时河道大幅度变宽。

en: It's easy to get a tummy upset from river water.
cn: 喝河水很容易闹肚子。

en: Across the river the railway track ran up to the pithead.
cn: 铁轨跨过这条河直达矿井口。

en: Sir Robert made his announcement after talks with the President.
cn: 在与总统会谈之后，罗伯特爵士发表了声明。

en: Kenya's Robert Kibe was the fastest qualifier for the 800 metres final.
cn: 肯尼亚的罗伯特·基布是800米决赛入围者中速度最快的选手.

en: It seemed to me that Sir Robert's arguments were nonsensical.
cn: 在我看来，罗伯特爵士的争辩纯属瞎说。

en: He once told an interviewer that he didn't even like rock music.
cn: 他曾告诉一位采访者，他甚至都不喜欢摇滚乐。

en: A young man plunged from a sheer rock face to his death.
cn: 一名男青年从陡峭的岩壁上坠崖身亡。

en: Changing stresses bring about more cracking and rock deformation.
cn: 不断变化的应力导致更多的断裂和岩石变形。

en: The brothers usually roll into their studio around midday.
cn: 兄弟几个总是要到正午前后才姗姗来到工作室。

en: Rock'n'roll has become so commercialised and safe since punk.
cn: 摇滚乐自从朋克乐以后就已经过于商业化而缺乏新意了。

en: A roll of fat jiggled on the underside of her arm.
cn: 她胳膊下侧有一层肥肉一颤一颤的。

en: The light went out, and the room was plunged into darkness.
cn: 灯熄了，屋里陷入一片漆黑。

en: The room was quiet; no one volunteered any further information.
cn: 房间很安静，无人主动提供更多的信息。

en: I took the phone, and she went discreetly into the living room.
cn: 我拿起了电话，她知趣地进了客厅。

en: They rose to the challenge of entertaining 80 school-children for an afternoon.
cn: 他们一个下午成功接待了80名学童。

en: "Wait there!" Kathryn rose. "No, on second thought, follow me."
cn: “在那儿等着！”凯瑟琳站起身来，“不，我改主意了。跟我来。”

en: The powdery dust rose in a cloud around him.
cn: 一团粉尘在他周围扬起。

en: It was just then that I chanced to look round.
cn: 就在那时，我恰好环顾了下四周。

en: I shivered and pulled my scarf more tightly round my neck.
cn: 我打了个寒战，用围巾把脖子围得更紧了。

en: He tramped hurriedly round the lake towards the garden.
cn: 他匆匆地迈着沉重的步伐绕过湖边向花园走去。

en: The ballot was re-run on Mr Todd's insistence after accusations of malpractice.
cn: 因被控舞弊，在托德先生的坚持下重新进行了投票。

en: The President's speeches are regularly reproduced verbatim in the state-run newspapers.
cn: 总统的讲话通常会被一字不差地刊登在国有报纸上。

en: Perot hoped to run another series of campaign infomercials.
cn: 佩罗期待着新一轮的竞选宣传节目的播出。

en: This condition is called seasonal affective disorder, or SAD for short.
cn: 这种病情叫做季节性情感失调症，或简称SAD。

en: Guy Powell, defending, told magistrates: "It's a sad and disturbing case."
cn: 盖伊·鲍威尔在进行辩护时对地方法官说道：“这是一件非常不幸、令人不安的案子。”

en: I'm sad about my toys getting burned in the fire.
cn: 我的玩具在这场火中付之一炬，这令我很难过。

en: Just play it safe, cover your ass, keep your head down.
cn: 要谨慎行事，保护好自己并保持低调。

en: Rock'n'roll has become so commercialised and safe since punk.
cn: 摇滚乐自从朋克乐以后就已经过于商业化而缺乏新意了。

en: I wanted to get her away to somewhere safe.
cn: 我想带她逃到一个安全的地方。

en: He said they should turn their fire on the Conservative Party instead.
cn: 他说他们应该掉转枪口，向保守党开火。

en: "I think I'll try a hypnotist," I said with sudden resolution.
cn: “我会找催眠师试试，”我突然坚决地说。

en: He said parliament and the process of democracy had been debased.
cn: 他说议会和民主程序已遭贬值。

en: "For heaven's sake!" Dot expostulated. "They're cheap and they're useful."
cn: “拜托！”多特反驳道，“它们又便宜又管用。”

en: Economic change for its own sake did not appeal to him.
cn: 经济变化本身对他并没有吸引力。

en: For God's sake shut up. I can't hear myself think!
cn: 看在老天爷的份上，闭嘴吧。吵死我了！

en: Driving a boat is not the same as driving a car.

cn: 这些选择实际上只会造成经济形势更加恶化，赤字愈见增加。

en: Social and economic problems can only worsen.
cn: 社会问题和经济形势每况愈下.

en: Mr. Buck is a good and worthful man.
cn: 巴克先生是个善良可敬的人.

en: Coming from medical science, case study mainly refers to a special worthful case.
cn: 个案源于医学, 特指一份典型而有价值的病例.

en: " And now what wouldst thou with me touching this man? "
cn: “ 那么,如今你要我对那个人怎么办 呢 ? ”

en: " Wouldst thou avenge thyself on the innocent babe? " whispered she. "
cn: " 你打算在这无辜的婴儿身上发泄你的仇恨 吗 ? " 她悄声说.

en: Thou wouldst not, yonder, in the forest!
cn: 那天在那树林里你不肯亲我!

en: Those three modern novels are denounced as equally obscence by the wowser.
cn: 那三本现代小说均被道学先生们斥为同样猥亵.

en: She has a first-class brain and is a damned good writer.
cn: 她头脑相当灵光，是个非常棒的作家。

en: He is a dull writer and that's a fact.
cn: 他写的东西很没意思，真的。

en: The truth is, I'm a failed comedy writer really.
cn: 事实上，我真的是个很失败的喜剧作家。

en: She had written him a note a couple of weeks earlier.
cn: 她几周前给他写过一个便条。

en: His speeches were magnificently written but his delivery was hopeless.
cn: 他的发言稿写得非常精彩，但他的演讲风格真是无可救药。

en: He crossed out "Screenplay" and put "Written by" instead.
cn: 他划掉了“编剧”二字，改为“作者”。

en: A wrongdoer is constantly haunted by the fear of discovery.
cn: 作恶者经常心中害怕被发觉.

en: The judge was lenient with the wrongdoer.
cn: 法官对这个犯人很宽大.

en: A wrongdoer is constantly haunted by fear of discovery.
cn: 作恶者常提心吊胆,怕被别人发觉.

en: "Have they been to visit you yet?" — "Just the once, yeah."
cn: “他们来看过你吗?”——“来过,就一次.”

en: "We're all talking at the same time." — "Yeah. Sorry."
cn: “我们俩在同时讲话。”——“噢，抱歉。”

en: "Find anything?" he asked. "Yeah. The plot thickens," I said.
cn: “有什么发现没有？”他问。“嗯，情况越来越复杂了，”我说。

en: And you just like a docile yeanling.
cn: 而你就像一只温顺的小绵羊.

en: The trees come up to my window like the yeanling voice of the dumb earth.
cn: 绿树长到了我的窗前,仿佛是无言的大地发出饥渴的声音.

en: Eleanor was thirty - four and saddled with five kids, including a yearling.
cn: 埃莉诺当时已经三十四岁,有五个孩子缠身, 最小的不满两周岁.

en: Then there's Betty Yearling and Betty White.
cn: 还有贝蒂伊儿玲和贝蒂怀德.

en: Question 9 : When does a foal become a yearling?
cn: 问题9:成为周岁驹的年龄?

en: Beijing was raining continually yestereve.
cn: 北京昨晚一直下雨.

en: The composition about the Olympic Games that WJ asked me for yestereve is not easy.
cn: 而她妹妹WJ昨晚让我帮忙写的关于畅想奥运的作文也还真不好写.

en: Again in 1419 the Yorkist hope revived.
cn: 1419年,约克派的希望又死灰复燃起来.

en: Madam, " he replied, " I am indeed a Yorkist , and in some sort, a spy. "
cn: “ 小姐, ” 他回答说, “ 我确是一个约克党人, 而且也带着点儿探子的成份.

en: And would you believe it, he's younger than me!
cn: 你信吗？他比我年轻！

en: A new study proved conclusively that smokers die younger than non-smokers.
cn: 一项新的研究确证了吸烟者比不吸烟者死得早。

en: I'm only 5ft tall, and I look younger than my age.
cn: 我才5英尺高，显得比实际年龄小。

en: You flatter yourself. Why would we go to such ludicrous lengths?
cn: 你真自以为是。我们为什么要费那么大的力气？

en: It's enough to make you wet yourself, if you'll pardon the expression.
cn: 这足以吓得你尿裤子了，请原谅我这么说。

en: I'll say you started it, that you threw yourself at me.
cn: 我觉得是你主动向我投怀送抱。

en: I've been wondering if you yourselves have any idea why she came.
cn: 我一直在想，你们自己是否知道她为什么来。

en: Sylvia shook hands. "Well, you go get yourselves some breakfast."
cn: 西尔维娅摆了摆手说：“嗯，你们自己去吃些早餐吧。”

en: You ought to be ashamed of yourselves. You've created this problem.
cn: 你们应该感到惭愧，都是你们惹的祸。

en: Pragmatically, MTV's survival depends on selling the youth market to advertisers.
cn: 从务实角度来说，音乐电视网的生存依赖于把年轻人市场卖给广告商。

en: Teachers often view youth workers as undisciplined and ineffectual.
cn: 老师们常认为青少年工作者纪律性差且能力低下。

en: I think your South American youth has prejudiced you.
cn: 我认为你在南美度过的青少年时代让你产生了偏见。

en: All students without exception must take the english examination.
cn: 所有学生都必须参加英语考试，无一例外。

en: There have been some problems but basically it's a good system.
cn: 虽然出现过一些问题，但这基本上仍不失为一个好系统。

en: We must make good use of the available space.
cn: 我们必须充分利用现有空间。

en: It is quite possible that space and time are finite.
cn: 很有可能空间和时间是有限的。
